programme.title: Love is a Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Jessie Dale is a third generation baker who loves her cake shop more than anything in the world. When developers threaten to buy her building and force her out, she must do all she can to save her bakery, all while juggling a blossoming romance with her client's brother.

programme.title: A Slice of Chicago Romance
programme.desc: In a suburb of Chicago, Romanos & Juliatos, two pizza places, have competed for the town's business for years. When both restaurants get passed down to—RILEY (30s) and SARAH (30s)—after a new pizza chain moves into town, the new bosses struggle to compete after they begin to fall for one another.

programme.title: Calling for Love
programme.desc: When successful podcaster Samantha Desouza is re-assigned to host Heartwaves, a feel-good love song show with a segment that reunites lost loves, she is less than impressed – love isn't her favourite topic right now.

programme.title: The Charm of Love
programme.desc: Art historian Madison “Maddie” TURNER, an expert in ancient artifacts and in deflecting unwanted male attention, travels halfway around the world to the Caribbeans in order to find the legendary "Lovers Stone".

programme.title: Listen Out for Love
programme.desc: Peyton Pepper, a goal-driven podcast producer, is forced to mold Alex McKinney, a brash loose cannon, into her next star and create the perfect show to save both of their careers. That show comes in the form of finding Peyton's iconic idol, true love.

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Celebrated and adored by millions, she was the Queen of people's hearts, yet the bittersweet story of the last man to truly capture hers has never before. In a story that until now has remained untold, Diana introduces a time in the Princess's life that was important in shaping her final years...

programme.title: Alone Together
programme.desc: Two strangers wind up double-booked in the same New York rental at the start of quarantine. Exasperating the situation, these polar opposites must learn to cope with each other's eccentricities, realizing they have more in common than meets the eye.

programme.title: Love, Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since age six. As they dream of travelling the world, they decide to leave their small British town for Boston together to attend university. But fate has other plans...

programme.title: Lust For Love
programme.desc: Astor's happy tenacity spoils his one chance at love with his lifelong crush Mila. Convinced he needs more experience with women to win her back, he engages her ex-best friend Cali to teach him how to woo women.

programme.title: Can You Keep A Secret?
programme.desc: On a return flight from a botched client meeting, Emma reveals all of her deepest secrets to a handsome stranger when her plane hits turbulence and she believes she is going to die. Emma thinks she will never see the guy again.

programme.title: The Wedding Arrangements
programme.desc: When talented botanist Violet needs help preparing flower arrangements for a high-profile wedding, she calls upon Jack, a handsome nature photographer who has taken over responsibility for his grandfather's flower shed.

programme.title: Mr. Morgan's Last Love
programme.desc: From the day Pauline (Clemence Poésy) lends him a helping hand on the bus, the stubborn and weary Matthew Morgan (Sir Michael Caine) stumbles back to happiness.

programme.title: Snitch
programme.desc: In the fast-paced action thriller SNITCH, Dwayne Johnson stars as a father whose teenage son is wrongly accused of a drug distribution crime and is looking at a mandatory minimum prison sentence of 10 years.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer Aimes is just your average, undercover, super-assassin accustomed to a life of flashy sports cars and even flashier women. But when he meets Jen Kornfeldt, a fun-loving computer tech, he finds true love… and happily trades international intrigue for domestic bliss.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as the leader of a group of German officers who hatched a plot to assassinate Hitler. The operation was code-named "Valkyrie," for the emergency plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.title: The Legend Of Hercules
programme.desc: In the epic origin story the legend of Hercules, a half-god, half-man blessed with extraordinary streng. Betrayed by his stepfather, the king, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Two women become bank robbers to help the poor and seek revenge on a ruthless land baron.

programme.title: The Siege
programme.desc: Walker, an international assassin, is compromised during a mission. His handler sends him to a Reassignment Center at which Walker will be processed for a new identity. During his stay at the facility, a ruthless assault team storms the compound searching for someone their boss has lost.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

programme.title: Breaker! Breaker!
programme.desc: Truck driver searches for his brother, who has disappeared in a town run by a corrupt judge.

programme.title: Exit Speed
programme.desc: Strangers use improvised weapons, adrenaline and sheer guts to mount a defense against murderous bikers and their survival depends on doing the unthinkable - fighting for their lives!

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer Aimes is just your average, undercover, super-assassin accustomed to a life of flashy sports cars and even flashier women. But when he meets Jen Kornfeldt, a fun-loving computer tech, he finds true love… and happily trades international intrigue for domestic bliss.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig stars as Imogene, once a promising young New York playwright whose promise has fizzled, thanks to a crisis of confidence. Heavily in denial about being dumped by her society boyfriend, Imogene uses her skill for drama to stage an elaborate fake suicide as an appeal for his sympathy.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Big Momma is back — and this time he has big backup: his teenage stepson Trent (Brendan T. Jackson). Martin Lawrence returns as FBI agent Malcolm Turner and as Turner's deep-cover alter-ego Big Momma.

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: It was a stroke of genius, but now the perfect crime is turning into a perfect disaster.

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: A couple going through a divorce squabble over custody of their beloved dog.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Yes, God, Yes
programme.desc: Growing up in the Midwest in the early OOs, sixteen-year-old Alice has always been a good Catholic. But when an innocent AOL chat turns racy, she discovers masturbation and is overwhelmed with guilt. Seeking redemption, she attends a mysterious religious retreat to try and suppress her urges...

programme.title: I Want You Back
programme.desc: Peter and Emma thought they were on the precipice of life's biggest moments – marriage, kids, and houses in the suburbs – until their respective partners dumped them.

programme.title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
programme.desc: A Comedy About Old Friends In New Positions. A Good Old-Fashioned Orgy is about a close group of 30-somethings who spend every weekend of the summer throwing elaborate parties at the house belonging to group member Eric in the Hamptons.

programme.title: Killing Gunther
programme.desc: A dysfunctional team of young assassins set out to make a name for themselves by killing the most notorious hitman of all time, Gunther (Arnold Schwarzenegger).

programme.title: Monte Carlo

programme.title: Scarecrows

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Photographer Adam Stanheight (Leigh Whannell) and oncologist Lawrence Gordon (Cary Elwes) regain consciousness while chained to pipes at either end of a filthy bathroom. As the two men realize they've been trapped by a sadistic serial killer nicknamed "Jigsaw" and must complete his perverse puzzle to live, flashbacks relate the fates of his previous victims. Meanwhile, Dr. Gordon's wife (Monica Potter) and young daughter (Makenzie Vega) are forced to watch his torture via closed-circuit video.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Two centuries after Dr. Frankenstein assembles and reanimates his creature, Adam (Aaron Eckhart) is still living. He becomes embroiled in a war between two immortal races: gargoyles, the traditional protectors of mankind, and evil demons. Since Adam is neither human nor demon, gargoyle Queen Leonore (Miranda Otto) and demon Prince Naberius (Bill Nighy) each want him for their own purposes. It is up to Adam to discover his inner humanity and the reason for his continued existence.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: After a virus turns most people into zombies, the world's surviving humans remain locked in an ongoing battle against the hungry undead. Four survivors -- Tallahassee (Woody Harrelson) and his cohorts Columbus (Jesse Eisenberg), Wichita (Emma Stone) and Little Rock (Abigail Breslin) -- abide by a list of survival rules and zombie-killing strategies as they make their way toward a rumored safe haven in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: Iron Man, Thor, the Hulk and the rest of the Avengers unite to battle their most powerful enemy yet -- the evil Thanos. On a mission to collect all six Infinity Stones, Thanos plans to use the artifacts to inflict his twisted will on reality. The fate of the planet and existence itself has never been more uncertain as everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: On the hunt for the twisted vigilante and serial killer Jigsaw, Detective Eric Matthews and his team must apprehend the elusive murderer to rescue eight people trapped in an abandoned house, before they succumb to his torturous and murderous games. One twist to this task is that Matthews' own son, Daniel, is among the eight people Jigsaw has chosen to test for their lack of morality. With nerve gas pumping through the house, every second counts.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: Dr. Lynn Denlon (Bahar Soomekh) becomes a pawn in the Jigsaw Killer's (Tobin Bell) latest gory game. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: Life Today With James Robison
programme.desc: James Robison is a former preacher who changed directions in his life several years ago and began hosting this television show alongside his wife, Betty, in order to reach out to help more people. This daily religious and self-help program welcomes guests who tell how they have successfully overcome difficulties in their lives by following God's word -- with the hope of encouraging others to do the same and look to God for help and guidance in times of need. programme.desc: S10 E489 Les as des bons plans Limiter le gaspillage, sauver le pouvoir d'achat, faire des économies : en ces temps traversés par les crises, certains Français cherchent des solutions pour permettre à leurs concitoyens de garder la tête hors de l'eau. De la Bretagne à la Lorraine, en passant par le Pays de la Loire ou par La Réunion, gros plan sur des entrepreneurs courageux, des passionnés qui ont osé braver les difficultés pour porter un projet plus grand qu'eux et faire de la crise un nouveau départ.

programme.title: Automoto
programme.desc: S27 E8 Nouveau logo, nouveau décor, nouvel habillage et nouvelle pilote : Automoto, présentée par Jean-Pierre Gagick, fait peau neuve. Cette saison, pour la première fois dans une émission automobile en France, une pilote réalisera les essais chronométrés : Sarah Bovy, la première femme à avoir signé une pole position en championnat du monde d'endurance, prendra place aux côtés des pilotes historiques de l'émission comme Anthony Beltoise ou Bruce Jouanny. Côté motos, les habitués d'Automoto pourront également retrouver Bader Benlekehal. En parallèle, l'émission continuera de proposer une large diversité de sujets et de reportages : nouvelle rubrique pratique, essais, comparatifs, sports mécaniques, vintage, l'objectif est de réunir et d'expliquer les thématiques automobiles et motos au plus grand nombre.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: It's been nearly a decade since Tarzan, also known as John Clayton III, left Africa to live in Victorian England with his wife Jane. Danger lurks on the horizon as Leon Rom, a treacherous envoy for King Leopold, devises a scheme that lures the couple to the Congo. Rom plans to capture Tarzan and deliver him to an old enemy in exchange for diamonds. When Jane becomes a pawn in his devious plot, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion'.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Doc's violent, bank-robbing cronies, including Buddy, Bats and Darling, get in and out of Dodge before it's too late. He's not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick O'Connell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.desc: To prevent a terrorist attack on US soil, a Navy SEAL team leader and a CIA analyst must retrieve a detainee from a secret compound while fending off an assault by insurgents.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Han's tomb is discovered, and Rick O'Connell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthor's latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: NFL Fantasy Live
programme.desc: Millions of NFL fans live in a fantasy world where survival depends on successfully navigating the twists and turns of a grueling season. After all, relying on a second-string quarterback or an untested wide receiver to come up big is usually foolhardy. Avoiding such predicaments takes plenty of preparation, and that's where "NFL Fantasy Live" comes into play. Host Marcas Grant provides the advice and analysis fantasy fans need to make winning lineup decisions. And being armed with the latest player updates, stats and trends goes a long way toward turning fantasies into championships.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Live
programme.desc: Expanding on NFL Network's "GameDay" programming on Sundays during football season, "GameDay Live" updates viewers on what's happening throughout the league. Beginning with kickoff of early-afternoon events and continuing throughout late-afternoon contests, the studio show offers nearly immediate highlights of scoring and other notable plays. But the program is about more than the action; it intersperses highlights of press conferences, interviews with players and coaches, and live reports by announcers at game sites.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: Les Traîtres
programme.desc: Mentaliste, auteur de roman policier, chanteurs, comédiens, streameur, humoriste, ancienne ministre ou ex-sélectionneur de l’équipe de France : ils sont 16 à entrer dans le jeu, prêts à tout pour décrocher les lingots au profit de leur association mais aussi pour enfin faire vaciller les traîtres.

programme.title: Les traîtres
programme.desc: S5 E7 La finale Après le quatrième épisode, deux Traîtres avaient été démasqués coup sur coup par le reste des joueurs pour lesquels l'espoir est grand de voir enfin les Loyaux l'emporter après quatre échecs. Malmenées, Anne-Elisabeth Blateau, Danielle et Frédérique Bel espèrent bien parvenir à rester dans l'ombre.

programme.title: Les Traîtres
programme.desc: Après une saison riche en émotions et en stratégies, les candidats de la cinquième saison des Traîtres se retrouvent autour d'Éric Antoine pour un rendez-vous exceptionnel. Au programme : des séquences inédites, des face-à-face explosifs entre les joueurs, des coulisses du tournage...

programme.title: Les traîtres
programme.desc: S5 E8 The Reunion Après une saison riche en émotions et en stratégies, les candidats de la cinquième saison des Traîtres se retrouvent autour d'Eric Antoine. Au programme : des séquences inédites, des face-à-face explosifs entre les joueurs ainsi que des coulisses du tournage. Traîtres et Loyaux reviennent sans filtre sur leurs choix et expliquent leurs coups les plus marquants. Entre révélations, anecdotes et ultimes trahisons, l'aventure est loin d'être terminée.

programme.title: Et Si On Se Rencontrait ? - Et Si On Se Rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Suivez les incroyables histoires d’amour de ces couples qui ont craqué virtuellement l’un pour l’autre, et qui se rencontrent pour la première fois en vrai. Cette fois, c’est au château de Serans, dans l’Oise, que ces amoureux virtuels vont passer du fantasme à la réalité.

programme.title: Et Si On Se Rencontrait ? - Et Si On Se Rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Comme des millions de Français, ces hommes et ces femmes ont rencontré quelqu'un en ligne, sur les réseaux sociaux, un forum de discussion, une application de rencontres… Depuis des mois, des années parfois.

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: S1 E3 Des hommes et des femmes entretiennent une vraie relation en ligne depuis des mois voire des années. Mais est-il possible de tomber amoureux d'une personne à distance ? Aujourd'hui, ils ont décidé de franchir le pas, de passer du fantasme à la réalité et de se rencontrer.

programme.desc: E7 Reportages, portraits, enquêtes, 66 Minutes explore l'actualité de la semaine avec des reportages sur des faits divers, des phénomènes de société ou des événements de l'actualité internationale.

programme.title: Météo
programme.desc: Toute l'actualité météorologique.

programme.title: Le 19:45
programme.desc: Le journal de M6.

programme.title: Le 2010, Anne-Sophie Lapix
programme.desc: Anne-Sophie Lapix propose une interview exclusive d’une dizaine de minutes avec une personnalité marquante de la semaine. Qu’il s’agisse d’une figure connue ou d’un visage anonyme, les invités viennent de tous horizons : société, culture, sport, politique, international, etc.

programme.title: E=M6
programme.desc: e=m6 est LE magazine scientifique familial par excellence pour apprendre de manière ludique au travers d'expériences visuelles, de témoignages, de décryptages de spécialistes qui répondent aux questions que tout le monde se pose….

programme.title: Zone Interdite
programme.desc: C’est une première en France ! L’ouverture de deux prisons de haute-sécurité conçues pour enfermer les deux-cents narcotrafiquants les plus dangereux de France.

programme.title: Zone interdite
programme.desc: E4 Au coeur des nouvelles prisons de haute sécurité Zone Interdite a pu pénétrer au coeur des centres pénitentiaires de Condé-sur-Sarthe et de Vendin-le-Vieil, deux prisons de haute-sécurité conçues pour enfermer les 200 narcotrafiquants les plus dangereux de France. Ces établissements ont été pensés pour maintenir les détenus dans un isolement total.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: La France produit près de 340 millions de tonnes de déchets par an, un des volumes les plus élevés d’Europe. En marge des filières légales, 35 000 dépôts sauvages prolifèrent sur tout le territoire.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: Trafics, dépôts sauvages : la France croule sous les ordures ! La France produit près de 340 millions de tonnes de déchets par an, un des volumes les plus élevés d'Europe. En marge des filières légales, 35 000 dépôts sauvages prolifèrent sur tout le territoire. Et de lucratifs trafics de déchets s'organisent, faisant peser des risques sur l'environnement et la santé.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: En 2022, le nombre d’arnaques à domicile a explosé. Huit millions de Français ont été dépouillés chez eux. C’est deux fois plus qu’il y a dix ans. Pour tromper la vigilance de leurs victimes, les escrocs redoublent d’imagination.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: E5 Arnaques à domicile : enquête sur ces nouveaux délinquants qui frappent à votre porte En 2022, le nombre d'arnaques à domicile a explosé. Huit millions de Français ont été dépouillés chez eux. Pour tromper la vigilance de leurs victimes, les escrocs redoublent d'imagination. Faux postiers, faux prince charmant, faux dépanneurs, enquête sur ces nouveaux délinquants.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: Le procureur de Bobigny dresse un constat alarmant : en Seine-Saint-Denis en 2024, le nombre d’homicides liés au narcotrafic a triplé, 15 morts, et les tentatives d'homicides, 73, sur fond de stupéfiants ont explosé.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: BAC du 93, la guerre aux narcotrafiquants est déclarée En Seine-Saint-Denis en 2024, le nombre d'homicides liés au narcotrafic a triplé, et les tentatives d'homicides comme la violence ordinaire ont explosé. La guerre de territoire sans merci que se livrent les narcotrafiquants fait de la Seine-Saint-Denis l'un des départements les plus criminogènes de France.

programme.title: Kaamelott

programme.title: Live: The Paul Finebaum Show
programme.desc: Veteran writer, reporter and radio personality Paul Finebaum built a legion of loyal sports fans as the "Voice of the SEC" during 20 years hosting his Birmingham, Ala.-based radio talk show. When ESPN launched the SEC Network in 2014, it was only natural that Finebaum became its first on-air hire, bringing his radio show -- and those passionate followers -- with him. Now originating from one of the SEC Network studios in Charlotte, N.C., the show is a forum for lively discussion and debate of all things SEC and across the spectrum of college sports, with Finebaum playing the role of both moderator and provocateur. The show airs weekday afternoons throughout the year on SEC Network.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder in Paris' Louvre Museum and cryptic clues in some of Leonardo da Vinci's most famous paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery. For 2,000 years a secret society closely guards information that -- should it come to light -- could rock the very foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean is a man of action. Less than 24 hours into his parole from a New Jersey penitentiary, the wry, charismatic thief is already rolling out his next plan. He follows three rules: do not hurt anybody, do not steal from anyone who does not deserve it, and play the game like you have got nothing to lose. With those in mind, Danny works to orchestrate the most sophisticated, elaborate casino heist in history, targeting three establishments owned by the man who is dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: A mother leans on her horn at the wrong time, to the wrong guy. Road rage doesn't begin to describe what he's about to do to her and everyone she knows.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean is a man of action. Less than 24 hours into his parole from a New Jersey penitentiary, the wry, charismatic thief is already rolling out his next plan. He follows three rules: do not hurt anybody, do not steal from anyone who does not deserve it, and play the game like you have got nothing to lose. With those in mind, Danny works to orchestrate the most sophisticated, elaborate casino heist in history, targeting three establishments owned by the man who is dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: After pulling off their Las Vegas casino heist, Danny Ocean incurs the wrath of Terry Benedict, who wants his money back with interest. Lacking the cash to meet his two-week deadline, the crew of thieves must plan an elaborate robbery in Europe, or their lives will be forfeit. While they have Danny's wife on their side, they face a new challenge in the form of the mysterious 'Night Fox', who seems to be the better thief.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoner's psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: After pulling off their Las Vegas casino heist, Danny Ocean incurs the wrath of Terry Benedict, who wants his money back with interest. Lacking the cash to meet his two-week deadline, the crew of thieves must plan an elaborate robbery in Europe, or their lives will be forfeit. While they have Danny's wife on their side, they face a new challenge in the form of the mysterious 'Night Fox', who seems to be the better thief.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: Louis Bloom finds himself falling head first in to the shady world of crime journalism. He quickly develops a taste for the profession and discovers that he has got both the business acumen and a strong enough stomach to fend off his rivals.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plans to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: A teacher's grandmother dies and she inherits her grandmother's cute but mischievous pug. The dog is only small but has the ability to have a big impact and turn the teacher's life upside down.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: Anachronisms abound in this tongue-in-cheek tale of a young peasant who improves his lot by masquerading as a knight.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with mum and daughter Linda and Laura, who were looking for a Bristol bolthole that would suit the whole family at all stages, and Ranald and Marjorie, who were upsizing in Glasgow.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil are in Chippenham to help Tim and Sonia decide whether to stay put or sell their home. The couple moved into Tim's childhood home eight years ago to care for his elderly mother, Sonia becoming her primary carer before she passed.

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In 2019, Olaf and Fritha set out to create an oasis on a tricky slice of land in West Sussex, boxed in by an A-road and a train line. Kevin returns to see how life has been in their triangular house.

programme.title: Channel 4 News [NEW]
programme.desc: Channel 4's flagship news programme. With sport and weather.

programme.title: Bettany Hughes' Treasures of the World [NEW]
programme.desc: Bettany embarks on a new journey and takes us on an armchair adventure through coastal Croatia. She uncovers a Neolithic settlement in Korcula, and explores Diocletian's Palace in Split.

programme.title: Great British Train Journeys From Above [NEW]
programme.desc: In Scotland, the Jacobite Steam Train, better known as the Hogwarts Express, travels across the Scottish Highlands, unlocking the fascinating history of the Jacobite Rebellion.

programme.title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent [NEW]
programme.desc: Facing financial ruin, actor Nick Cage accepts $1 million to attend a wealthy fan's birthday party. Taking on the role of a lifetime, he soon finds himself channeling his most iconic and beloved characters to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: Le Mans '66
programme.desc: Automotive designer Carroll Shelby and race car driver Ken Miles build a revolutionary vehicle for the Ford Motor Co. to compete against the race cars of Enzo Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in France in 1966.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours in...

programme.desc: When the Good Neighbor Robots confuse Farmer Al's request for goat cheese and create a goat out of cheese instead, they wind up the target of a hungry eagle.

programme.title: Milo
programme.desc: Leonard Lizard loves his supermarket job. Milo, Lofty and Lark are excited to work at the checkouts and stacking shelves. But a strange squeaking makes all the customers flee.

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: After Queen Thistle reads the children a story about the stars, the children wonder where they go in the daytime, so they pay a visit to the Wise Old Elf.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are spending a day helping Dr Hamster the Vet. They meet so many pets and have such fun.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa's Playgroup has a garden outside. The children are all having fun growing different plants and playing hide and seek in the wild wood.

programme.title: Milkshake! Story Den
programme.desc: Join Kemi for a story about a time when the sky hung so low that the birds couldn't fly and adults had to stoop as they walked! Can the children come up with a plan to lift the sky up.

programme.title: Jeremy Vine
programme.desc: Jeremy Vine and Storm discuss the latest news and get your views and opinions of the day.

programme.title: Storm Huntley
programme.desc: Storm Huntley carries on the discussion and takes your calls to discuss the biggest stories of the day.

programme.title: Vanessa

programme.desc: National and international news.

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: David's forced to revisit his pain. Abigail's haunted by her past. Lacey gives Theo a choice.

programme.title: New: The Hidden Guest
programme.desc: Thriller. Lured into an unwelcome reunion at a vacant ski lodge, former college friends fight to escape alive as they are targeted by an unseen adversary. (2024).

programme.title: New: The Cruise: Fun-Loving Brits at Sea
programme.desc: On a day at sea, Anne and Yvonne go head to head in a curling competition, spectate at a cocktail flaring competition and enjoy a theatrical divas-themed spectacular.

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Join Dan Walker and the team for the news that matters to you.

programme.title: Michael Portillo's Pyrenees Adventure
programme.desc: Michael enters a wintery wilderness at one of Europe's most spectacular natural barriers: the Cirque du Gavarnie, a 1700-metre-high wall of ice.

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The mysterious case of a hit and run crash leads to a pursuit across open fields. Near Harrogate, a disqualified driver with possible links to violence triggers a police camera.

programme.title: New: Call the Bailiffs: Time to...
programme.desc: ...Pay Up! Mark and Sam try to recover £11,000 from a cleaning business, Vlad tackles a £6,000 catering debt, and Alex pursues £55,000 in unpaid taxes from a property buyer.

programme.title: New: Coastguard SOS: Search & Rescue
programme.desc: After a fishing trawler in the North Sea sends out a distorted mayday, a helicopter crew must race to locate and save crew members afloat in dangerous, freezing waters.

programme.title: Dead Men Walking: Inside Death Row

programme.title: Wandsworth Prison: Out of Control
programme.desc: In this revealing documentary, ex-inmates, former prison officers and experts disclose what life is really like inside this Victorian prison and question why it is close to collapse.

programme.title: Car Pound Cops

programme.title: PlayOJO Live Casino Show

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The garden is accidentaly wrecked when Dennis tries to give Gnasher a bath, so the gang have to fix the mess before Mum comes home. Followed by 'Run Rabbit Run'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis makes a line of practical jokes for Mr. Scrimp, called 'The Menace Collection.' However, Dennis soon learns that it will put Mr. Har Har out of business.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Believing Gnasher and Gnipper to be trapped in Beanotown Dog Pound, Dennis comes up with a plan to rescue his friends and bring them both home. Followed by more Dennis and Gnasher episodes.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: When Dennis breaks his skateboard again, Dad agrees to buy Dennis the best skateboard there is as a replacement if he is able to win a prize at the upcoming school award ceremony. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dance of the Seven Pies'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis tries to get a birthday present by saying thank you to his relatives. However, because of Dennis' naughty personality, they take his attempts in a negative way. Followed by 'Dennis Hiccups'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Masters of the House'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After a wrestling accident, Gnasher swallows a canister of laughing gas at the vet's. Dennis, along with Gnasher hide in the conference centre, where dad gives a speech. However, the canister leaks, causing Gnasher to fart laughing gas and having everyone laughing. Followed by 'Attack of the Walterbot'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and Co. have to control Pie Face's obsession with pies during the Pie Festival. Otherwise, they will be grounded. Followed by 'Great Outdoors'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: On a school trip, Dennis finds out that he is descentant to a warrior tribe. He also discovers that Montanna Smith (a famous Indiana Jones-esque explorer and one of Walter's personal heroes) is actually a thief who's trying to steal the treasure of Dennis' ancestor. Will he be stopped before he gets his hands on the treasure? Followed by Dog Tired.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Mum has bought curtain material for the soon to be newly decorated kitchen, and asks Dad to look after it while she is out. However, Dad falls asleep and mistakenly agrees that Dennis can use it as a giant sail. When Dad realises that it has gone, he calls Dennis to bring it back, but unfortunately Dennis gets into a spot of bother with the colonel, who takes the curtain material off Dennis. In an attempt to steal it back, the garden being wrecked and the kitchen is left looking like a bombsite. Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, his friends and Walter's friends get marooned on a desert island when Dennis attempts to escape a boring field trip. Followed by Substitute Creecher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis plays a prank on the citizens of Beanotown, causing them to evacuate, which causes trouble for Dennis later. Followed by 'No Place Like Home'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.
