programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Rare painting illustrates the first air raids over London during World War I casket tie pins.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Porcelain pugs one of the earliest vacuum cleaners, a 17th century gate-leg table a superbly-painted plant pot.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: In Part II, Sonic and Sally steal the Roboti-sizer plans, stop the Destroyer from polluting the Great Forest and save Little Sonic, Little Sally and Dulcy's mother, Sabina.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After a disastrous failed mission, Sonic laments that they can't go back and prevent Robotnik's take-over. Dulcy tells them they can and takes Sonic and Sally to the Floating Island where they find the "Time Stones".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic attempts a solo rescue to prevent prisoners from being roboti-sized and is hit by a Memory Scrambler that erases short-term memory.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Tails brings a new friend home to Knothole - a baby Terra-Pod who has strayed from the herd that is currently migrating. Sonic, Sally, and some of the other Freedom Fighters return the Baby-T to its mom and the rest of the herd.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: While lost in the wastelands of Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia stumble upon an oasis called Lake Valley Resort.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik organizes a track meet to lure Sonic into a trap.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A group of Freedom Fighters is obliterated by a swarm of metallic fly-bots. When Manic goes looking for the insects, he is stung with serum.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik has his eyes set upon Queen Aleena's crown jewel, but Sonic, Manic and Sonia plan to retrieve the gem before Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia discovers that the watch she received from her friend is actually a monitoring device for the Robotnik Intelligence Agency.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs find out that Sonia has inherited a castle. She basks in the idea of having a castle for headquarters.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonic becomes aggravated that maybe their efforts of fighting for freedom seem pointless. Sonia suggests that they go to the Oracle for advice.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic joins up with a group of Dr. Robotnik's rejects who have been banished to the dump and helps them understand that their shortcomings were really their strenghs.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Mobius is suffering a crime spree and all the evidence points to Sonic as the culprit. But the real thief is a lab rat wearing a high-tech vehicle suit who was sent by Robotnik to discredit our hero.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic leaves Tails in charge of protecting a squirrel village food supply, when he zips off to stop a dam from breaking. Robotnik sends Scratch and Grounder after Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik installs a new "obedience microchip" in Scratch and Grounder and orders them to drill for a rare mineral in a tropical mountain. With his Freezomatic machine, Robotnik covers the mountain in ice and runs a Hermit out of his home.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Robotnik invades Labyrinth, an underwater city, and kidnaps Princess Bubbles, a seahorse-dude named Surff seeks Sonic's help. It seems Surff and the Princess are in love, but the royal family deems Surff "unworthy".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Professor Von Schlemmer (from Too Tall Tails) has created a machine which brings dreams to life. When Robotnik hears about it, he forces the Professor to alter the machine so that nightmares come to life.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a Brain Evolution Achievement Negatizer, or B.E.A.N., in order to make all of Mobius stupid. But instead of turning Sonic and Tails into dummies, the BEAN device turns them into three year old babies!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik plans to block out the sun and extinguish all life and nature on the planet Mobius. Then he creates a robot son and tries to train him in the ways of wickedness.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic attempts a solo rescue to prevent prisoners from being roboti-sized and is hit by a Memory Scrambler that erases short-term memory.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic Racer While on a mission to the big city to replace Nicole's malfunctioning microchip, Sonic and Sally encounter the Guardian, a mysterious cloaked figure who guards a dormant wizard named Lazar and his computer of evil spells.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: On a mission to contact the first Freedom Fighters on the King's List, Sonic and the others are forced to travel through a tunnel which carries a "curse" against all intruders.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic is almost sucked inside the Void, he finds a huge Ring which Sally believes is an ancient relic but it turns out to be trick of the Sorcerer, Nagus. Sally and Bunnie are drawn inside the Void and when Sonic comes to rescue them.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Antoine saves Sally's life during a raid, Sonic can't stand his bragging and zips in to see Uncle Chuck, who finds out his "bug" in Robotnik's HQ is malfunctioning.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic is hired into an obvious trap when a frustrated Robotnik decides to appeal to the Hedgehog's ego and announces a "race to determine the fastest on Mobius".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Uncle Chuck's "bug" reveals Robotnik's search for the legendary Deep Power Stones, he informs Sally, who tries to retrieve data regarding the Royal Family Secret. But she's denied access via a time-encoded lock-out.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil - a vehicle designated to locate and destroy living tissue matter - during a solo mission to the Badlands. Upon Sonic's return, the Freedom Fighters honor him with a victory party.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Robotnik launches a spy-orb that will uncover the Freedom Fighter's Knothole location, Sonic and Robot launch themselves up to the orbiting spy-sphere aboard a home-made rocket powered by Robotnik's discarded booster engine.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Rumor has it that Queen Aleena's journals are buried in the city of Tashistan. Sonic and his siblings search the city for the scrolls.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik has his eyes set upon Queen Aleena's crown jewel, but Sonic, Manic and Sonia plan to retrieve the gem before Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: While lost in the wastelands of Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia stumble upon an oasis called Lake Valley Resort.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia discovers that the watch she received from her friend is actually a monitoring device for the Robotnik Intelligence Agency.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs congregate on the Floating Island in their latest effort to find their mother. But Sleet and Dingo also have an interest in this island.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonic becomes aggravated that maybe their efforts of fighting for freedom seem pointless. Sonia suggests that they go to the Oracle for advice.

programme.title: Sonic Underground

programme.title: Creflo Dollar
programme.desc: Dr. Creflo Dollar ministers to people from all backgrounds with hopes for change; Creflo helps viewers find ways to renew their faith, mind, and spirit; based on the belief that the Bible is the written and inspired Word of God, the show is meant to invoke change in the lives of people across the globe; Creflo and his wife, Taffi, share their vision for everyone to hear the Word and gain understanding of God's love and promises.

programme.title: Hagee Ministries

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: "The 700 Club," which first broadcast in 1966, is a newsmagazine featuring guests, news, music, testimonies and spiritual stories from a Christian perspective. News stories are frequently related to Bible passages or deal with Christian lifestyle issues. Hosts of the long-running religious show include televangelist (and former candidate for the Republican presidential nomination) Pat Robertson, Terry Meeuwsen and Gordon Robertson, son of Pat. News items of interest are delivered by anchor John Jessup.

programme.title: Turning Point With Dr. David Jeremiah
programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.desc: EP13: DIMITAR BERBATOV: MUN 10/11. One of the most elegant players ever to grace the beautiful game, Dimitar Berbatov reached his peak in the red of Manchester United. The Bulgarian recalls his journey, from humble beginnings to becoming a Premier League.

programme.title: REWIND
programme.desc: EP01: PAUL SCHOLES - MY GREATEST RIVALRY. One of the greatest players of his generation revisits some of the iconic Manchester United v Liverpool clashes that he was a part of. We hear the stories behind the images from the greatest rivalry in English foo.

programme.title: PL BEST OF...
programme.desc: THE PREMIER LEAGUE HALL OF FAME. An action-packed hour featuring legendary Hall of Fame icons, including Ashley Cole, Andy Cole, Tony Adams, Peter Schmeichel, Paul Scholes, Thierry Henry, Alan Shearer, and Frank Lampard.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: EP04 : IAN WRIGHT HALL OF FAME SPECIAL. Now an Arsenal Legend, Ian Wright nearly walked away from the game after being rejected for a string of trials as a youngster. But here he tells us how he not only made it to the top, but how he carved his name into.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: EP06: DIDIER DROGBA HALL OF FAME SPECIAL. He scored 104 Premier League goals, making 55 assists in 254 English top flight matches for Chelsea. It’s no wonder then that four time Premier League winner Didier Drogba has earned a seat amongst the top table e.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS
programme.desc: EP07. Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every goal and key moment from the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: EP52: CHAMPIONS STORY. We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football—Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United’s record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatnes.

programme.title: Back to Bataan
programme.desc: This World War II film sees American army colonel Joseph Madden (John Wayne) stationed in the Philippines with much of his military support forced out of the region by Japanese troops. Despite the grim situation, the tenacious Madden attempts to rally Filipino guerrilla fighters to continue assaults on the Japanese. Among Madden's band of soldiers is Captain Andres Bonifacio (Anthony Quinn), who struggles with the burden of being the grandson of a war hero.

programme.title: Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: Based on Fyodor Dostoevsky's novel, Fyodor Karamazov (Lee J. Cobb) is a wealthy and controlling father who must choose an heir among his four sons. Dmitri (Yul Brynner), the oldest son, is engaged to Katya (Claire Bloom) but starts seeing his father's mistress, Grushenka (Maria Schell). The other brothers, Ivan (Richard Basehart), Alexey (William Shatner) and half-brother Smerdyakov (Albert Salmi), all have designs on the inheritance, ultimately leading to betrayal and murder.

programme.title: Quo Vadis
programme.desc: Returning from a military campaign abroad, General Marcus Vinicius (Robert Taylor) discovers that a new religion has taken hold in Rome: Christianity. When Vinicius encounters Lygia (Deborah Kerr), a follower of the strange religion, he quickly becomes smitten and tries to win her affections. Lygia is reluctant due to their differing beliefs. Complicating matters is the crazed Emperor Nero (Peter Ustinov), who blames the Christians for his own burning of Rome, beginning a wave of persecution.

programme.title: Top Hat
programme.desc: The story centers on wealthy Dale Tremont (Ginger Rogers), on holiday in London and Venice. She assumes that American entertainer Jerry Travers (Fred Astaire) is the husband of her friend Madge (Helen Broderick) -- who's actually the wife of Jerry's business manager Horace Hardwick (Edward Everett Horton).

programme.title: Beasts That Cling to the Straw
programme.desc: The destinies of numerous lowlifes converge and come crashing down.

programme.title: Easter Parade
programme.desc: In this lavish musical, Broadway star Don Hewes' (Fred Astaire) dancing partner (Ann Miller) goes solo, and Don declares that he can make a hit performer out of the next dancer he sees. This turns out to be the inexperienced Hannah (Judy Garland), who bristles as Don tries to make her into his old partner. But as he realizes that he is falling in love with Hannah, Don knows that he must let her grow into her own kind of dancer if he wants her to reach her full potential.

programme.title: Esperando la carroza
programme.desc: Mama Cora's four children argue over who should be forced to care for her in her old age.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: Nick Smith (Cecil Kellaway), a middle-aged roadside diner owner, hires a drifter, Frank Chambers (John Garfield), to work at his restaurant. Frank quickly begins an affair with Nick's beautiful young wife, Cora (Lana Turner), and the two conspire to kill Nick and seize his assets. When they succeed, local prosecutor Kyle Sackett (Leon Ames) becomes suspicious, but is unable to build a solid case. However, the couple soon realizes that no misdeed ever goes truly unpunished.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: A man races against time to save his son when a new rabies virus turns people into rampaging zombies in Venezuela.

programme.title: A Face in the Crowd
programme.desc: Ambitious young radio producer Marcia Jeffries (Patricia Neal) finds a charming rogue named Larry "Lonesome" Rhodes (Andy Griffith) in an Arkansas drunk tank and puts him on the air. Soon, Rhodes' local popularity gets him an appearance on television in Memphis, which he parlays into national network stardom that he uses to endorse a presidential candidate for personal gain. But the increasingly petulant star's ego, arrogance and womanizing threaten his rise to the top.

programme.title: The Day They Robbed the Bank of England
programme.desc: An Irish patriot (Aldo Ray) and his 1901 gang use an old sewer to reach Bank of England gold bullion.

programme.title: East of Eden
programme.desc: In this film based on John Steinbeck's epic novel, Cal Trask (James Dean), the son of a California farmer (Raymond Massey), feels that his father cares only about his brother, Aron (Richard Davalos). When Cal embarks on a business venture to gain the favor of his dad, he finds himself dealing with his estranged mother (Jo Van Fleet), now the owner of a brothel, and tensions in the family rise even further when he begins to fall for Aron's girlfriend, Abra (Julie Harris).

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: A Marseille police officer must take down a group of Italian robbers who drive powerful Ferraris with the older niece of Daniel, the driver of the legendary white taxi.

programme.title: Mr. and Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: When David Smith (Robert Montgomery) concedes to his wife, Ann (Carole Lombard), that he's not quite satisfied with their marriage, the couple's relationship spins into disarray. In the wake of David's confession, Ann learns that because of a legal snafu, they're not actually married. Ann uses her freedom to try the dating market, where she's courted by Jeff Custer (Gene Raymond), one of David's professional colleagues. David's attempts to win her back lead to several humorous situations.

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: Nick Smith (Cecil Kellaway), a middle-aged roadside diner owner, hires a drifter, Frank Chambers (John Garfield), to work at his restaurant. Frank quickly begins an affair with Nick's beautiful young wife, Cora (Lana Turner), and the two conspire to kill Nick and seize his assets. When they succeed, local prosecutor Kyle Sackett (Leon Ames) becomes suspicious, but is unable to build a solid case. However, the couple soon realizes that no misdeed ever goes truly unpunished.

programme.title: La Furia
programme.desc: Charges of possible drug trafficking strain the relationship between a federal judge and his son.

programme.title: A Face in the Crowd
programme.desc: Ambitious young radio producer Marcia Jeffries (Patricia Neal) finds a charming rogue named Larry "Lonesome" Rhodes (Andy Griffith) in an Arkansas drunk tank and puts him on the air. Soon, Rhodes' local popularity gets him an appearance on television in Memphis, which he parlays into national network stardom that he uses to endorse a presidential candidate for personal gain. But the increasingly petulant star's ego, arrogance and womanizing threaten his rise to the top.

programme.title: The Wrong Man
programme.desc: Musician Manny Balestrero (Henry Fonda) needs money to pay for his wife Rose's (Vera Miles) dental procedure. When he tries to borrow money from their insurance policy, someone at the office mistakes him for a man who had robbed them twice at gunpoint. After Manny is arrested, his defense attorney, Frank O'Connor (Anthony Quayle), works to demonstrate that Manny has an alibi for the crimes. The stress of the case, however, threatens to destroy Manny's family before his name can be cleared.

programme.title: East of Eden
programme.desc: In this film based on John Steinbeck's epic novel, Cal Trask (James Dean), the son of a California farmer (Raymond Massey), feels that his father cares only about his brother, Aron (Richard Davalos). When Cal embarks on a business venture to gain the favor of his dad, he finds himself dealing with his estranged mother (Jo Van Fleet), now the owner of a brothel, and tensions in the family rise even further when he begins to fall for Aron's girlfriend, Abra (Julie Harris).

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: A Marseille police officer must take down a group of Italian robbers who drive powerful Ferraris with the older niece of Daniel, the driver of the legendary white taxi.

programme.title: Mr. and Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: When David Smith (Robert Montgomery) concedes to his wife, Ann (Carole Lombard), that he's not quite satisfied with their marriage, the couple's relationship spins into disarray. In the wake of David's confession, Ann learns that because of a legal snafu, they're not actually married. Ann uses her freedom to try the dating market, where she's courted by Jeff Custer (Gene Raymond), one of David's professional colleagues. David's attempts to win her back lead to several humorous situations.

programme.title: Words on Bathroom Walls
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a mental illness during his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to open his heart and not be defined by his condition.

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: Defeated by Master Ip, martial arts expert Cheung Tin Chi tries to lead a normal life in Hong Kong until triad leaders draw him back into fighting.

programme.title: The Mating Game
programme.desc: Uptight IRS man Lorenzo Charlton (Tony Randall) is ordered to investigate rural rancher Pop Larkin (Paul Douglas), who is significantly in debt to the government. Lorenzo arrives in the country and is shocked to discover that Pop and his family are so oblivious to financial concerns they haven't ever bothered to do their taxes. Some moonshine, however, and Pop's lovely daughter, Mariette (Debbie Reynolds), help Lorenzo learn to relax, and he decides to help the Larkins' find a legal loophole.

programme.title: Buffaloed
programme.desc: A woman is desperate to escape her life in Buffalo and finds a way by becoming a debt collector.

programme.title: La Furia
programme.desc: Charges of possible drug trafficking strain the relationship between a federal judge and his son.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: The March sisters -- Meg (Janet Leigh), Jo (June Allyson), Beth (Margaret O'Brien) and Amy (Elizabeth Taylor) -- struggle to make ends meet in their New England household while their father is away fighting in the Civil War. Despite harsh times, they cling to optimism, often with neighbor Laurie (Peter Lawford) as a companion. As they mature, they face burgeoning ambitions and relationships, as well as tragedy, all the while maintaining their unbreakable bond.

programme.title: The Wrong Man
programme.desc: Musician Manny Balestrero (Henry Fonda) needs money to pay for his wife Rose's (Vera Miles) dental procedure. When he tries to borrow money from their insurance policy, someone at the office mistakes him for a man who had robbed them twice at gunpoint. After Manny is arrested, his defense attorney, Frank O'Connor (Anthony Quayle), works to demonstrate that Manny has an alibi for the crimes. The stress of the case, however, threatens to destroy Manny's family before his name can be cleared.

programme.title: The Last Shift
programme.desc: Calling it quits after 38 years, an aging fast-food worker trains his young replacement on the graveyard shift at Oscar's Chicken and Fish.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Ben Hur
programme.desc: An enslaved Judean prince (Charlton Heston) meets his Roman betrayer (Stephen Boyd), a former friend, in a chariot race.

programme.title: The Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Medieval tales of love and war as the gallant Sir Lancelot rides into battle beside King Arthur while harboring a secret love for his Queen. After successfully defending his beloved country, Arthur rewards his loyal soldier Lancelot by making him Queen Guinevere's champion, but Lancelot's happiness is shattered when Sir Mordred informs the King of his wife's clandestine relationship.

programme.title: T-34
programme.desc: In 1944, a young lieutenant leads a group of Russian soldiers in a German POW camp and plots a daring escape from captivity in a half-destroyed T-34 tank.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: Adopted by the wealthy rancher Arch Strobie, orphan Owen Daybright (Burt Lancaster) grows to be a respectable foreman on Strobie's ranch. Strobie's natural son, Lee (Robert Walker), is jealous of Owen and finally finds a way to undermine his upstanding brother. When Lee conceives an illegitimate child with Lily Fasken (Sally Forrest), who refuses to name him as the father, he tells her revenge-minded brothers that Owen is to blame, hoping they'll take his half-brother out of the picture.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: The March sisters -- Meg (Janet Leigh), Jo (June Allyson), Beth (Margaret O'Brien) and Amy (Elizabeth Taylor) -- struggle to make ends meet in their New England household while their father is away fighting in the Civil War. programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong police hunt for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the police recruit artist Lee Man.

programme.title: Bad Day at Black Rock
programme.desc: When John J. Macreedy (Spencer Tracy), a one-armed war veteran, arrives in the small desert town of Black Rock, he's not greeted warmly. Searching for a man named Komoko, Macreedy is met with disdain by virtually every local, including the resident thug, Hector David (Lee Marvin), and the imposing Reno Smith (Robert Ryan). As Macreedy's investigation deepens, hostility turns to violence -- and to imminent danger for the mysterious and inquisitive stranger.

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: Libby Lamm is a former top national security adviser who, while working with a ruthless, steely-willed political veteran, signed off on a controversial military action that was supposed to end the war on terror. The problem: thousands died under false pretenses. Haunted by what she knows, Libby sets out to tell the truth, risking treason -- and her own life -- to expose a cover-up that stretches all the way to the top.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
programme.desc: As the cruel captain of the HMS Bounty, a ship bound for Tahiti, William Bligh (Charles Laughton) wins few friends. When the crew members finally tire of his abuse, Fletcher Christian (Clark Gable) leads a mutiny, resulting in Bligh's unceremonious removal from the ship. While Christian and the remaining crew sail on to Tahiti, Bligh becomes intent on exacting revenge, and he targets Roger Byam (Franchot Tone), a sailor who had actually tried to stop the mutiny.

programme.desc: Two would-be thieves forge a surprising relationship with a housesitter when they accidentally trap themselves in a house they just broke into.

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: In Tom's Roadhouse bekommt der T1-Oldie neue Safari-Fenster, während bei den Roller-Profis der Flying Classics heute eine Ausfahrt ansteht. Motor-Spezialist Michi von den Minis Hamburg setzt bei der Getriebereparatur nicht nur auf seine Erfahrung, sondern auch auf selbstgebautes Spezialwerkzeug. Luftgekühlt geht es bei den Maschinen der Porsche-Klassiker von Lundtauto in Berlin zu.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Die frischlackierte Porsche-Karosse wartet bei Lundt in Berlin auf das Motorfinish, während Manni von den Minis Hamburg eine durchgerostete Tür wieder auf Vordermann bringt. Neue Achse und Bremsen, Edel-Felgen - Frischekur für den Bulli in Tom's Roadhouse. In der Roller-Werkstatt der Flying Classics ist heute Abschied angesagt: Die schwarze Vespa kehrt heim zu ihrem italienischen Besitzer.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Die Restaurierung des Porsche 911 ist abgeschlossen. Werkstatt-Chef Thomas Lundt persönlich übernimmt die erste Probefahrt. Leistungsstark und tiefergelegt präsentiert sich auch der top überholte T1 von Tom's Garage. In Hamburg prüft Blechroller-Profi Helge, ob die Vespa-Silberpfeil straßentauglich ist. Fummelig geht's heute bei den Minis Hamburg zu. Die restaurierte Tür muss wieder in den Wagen.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Neues Projekt, viel Arbeit. Werkstatt-Chef Thomas Lundt hat einen alten Porsche angeschleppt. Den Flying Classics aus Hamburg haben es Kultmopeds angetan. Besonders beliebt, die Ost-Marke Simson. In Tom's Roadhouse wird heute eine antike Vorkriegs-Limousine begutachtet: ein Steyr 220. Abschied bei den Minis Hamburg. Der TÜV-fertige Youngtimer wartet auf die stolze Besitzerin.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: In Tom's Roadhouse soll ein achtzigjähriger Ford ein paar PS zulegen, während die Porsche-Experten von 9elf einen äußerst seltenen Carrera 3.0 auf dem Weg zur erfolgreichen Hauptuntersuchung betreuen. Bei Il Motore steht ein Kellerfund vor der Entkernung: neuer Motor für einen alten Fiat 500. Eine top erhaltene DDR-Simson S50 findet ihren Weg zu den Spezialisten der Flying Classics.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Der Name ist Programm: Bei Il Motore dreht sich fast alles um Antriebsmaschinen. Minustemperaturen für die luftgekühlte Rarität von 9elf: Eisstrahlung beim Carrera 3.0. In der Halle der Flying Classics wartet ein schick überholtes Kultmoped auf die Abholung. Für eine Handvoll PS mehr muss sich der betagte Ford in Tom's Roadhouse von seinem Getriebe verabschieden.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Korrosion mit Coolnessfaktor: Auf dem Hof der Flying Classics landet eine Simson Schwalbe im Rost-Design. Die Porsche-Experten von 9elf verpassen dem frisch gestrahlten Carrera ein komplettes Check-up. In der Werkstatt von Il Motore wirkt strahlender Sand wahre Wunder. Motortausch für eine amerikanische Legende: In Tom's Roadhouse wartet ein Mustang auf seine neue Maschine.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Für den Carrera schlägt die Stunde der Wahrheit. Wird das edle Sammlerstück dem kritischen Prüfer-Blick standhalten? Der Il Motore-Chef jagt einen asiatischen Kultflitzer Marke Datsun auf den Leistungsstand. Geduldsprobe für den Vespa-Experten: Die Kupplung einer alten spanischen Vespa wird zum Problemfall. Auch die Montage des neuen Mustang-Motors wird zur kniffligen Herausforderung.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Das Team 9elf steigt um. Statt mit Porsche geben die PS-Experten im VW-Beetle Gas auf der Rennstrecke. Ein betagter Italiener muss sich beweisen. Läuft der bei Il Motore überholte Fiat-Motor problemlos? In Tom's Roadhouse bekommt das Ford-Hot Rod seine Achsen zurück. Wird die Problem-Kupplung der spanischen Vespa nach furioser Feinarbeit der Flying Classics wieder funktionieren?

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Beim Team 9elf treffen die langersehnten Edel-Felgen ein. Die Flying Classics bringen eine blaue Schwalbe auf Vordermann. Die Fachkenntnis des Il Motore-Teams ist ausnahmsweise bei einem Flugzeug-Oldie gefragt. Auch der Ford aus den 30er Jahren steht bei Tom's Roadhouse vor einer speziellen Premiere: Jungfernfahrt mit einem Gang mehr.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Ein Traumcabrio wartet bei Il Motore auf seine Motorrevision. Der Cadillac DeVille bringt die Fans von edlen Classic Cars zum Schwärmen. Das Team 9elf muss einen Porsche mit gestopften Rostlöchern durch die GTÜ-Prüfung bekommen. Außeneinsätze für die blaue Schwalbe bei den Flying Classics und den Mustang aus Tom's Roadhouse. Sind die Werkstatt-Eingriffe gut verlaufen?

programme.title: Klein aber fein
programme.desc: Der Airport der Nordseeinsel Sylt ist der nördlichste Verkehrsflughafen Deutschlands. In den Sommermonaten herrscht auf den zwei Start- und Landebahnen reger Flugbetrieb. Dann schlägt die große Stunde des kleinen, aber multifunktionalen Technikteams. Die Luftfahrt-Profis führen von der Einweisung der Maschinen, dem Be- und Entladen, der Betankung und Reinigung alles in Eigenregie durch.

programme.title: Gewürze
programme.desc: Überall auf der Welt werden Gewürze zum Aromatisieren von Speisen eingesetzt.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: In Tom's Roadhouse bekommt ein Oldie-VW-Bus aus Arizona eine Frischzellenkur, während bei Lundtauto in Berlin ein Porsche 911 aus den 1970er Jahren auf eine Komplettrestaurierung wartet. In der Werkstatt der Minis Hamburg kommen nur die britischen Originale auf die Hebebühne. Allein auf Motorroller und Mopeds mit Charakter haben sich die Flying Classics spezialisiert.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die erfolglose Suche nach einem sichereren Kühlmittel führt zur Erfindung von Teflon, eine beschädigte Lieferkiste zur Erfindung von Dynamit. Eine zufällige Begegnung zwischen dem Hollywoodstar Hedy Lamarr und einem Komponisten ebnet den Weg für WLAN - und Pawlows Hundeexperiment für unsere Handysucht.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein fehlgeschlagenes Experiment beschert uns das wichtigste Werkzeug zur Verbrechensbekämpfung. Ständig reißende Arbeiterhosen führen zur Erfindung von Kunststoff. Ein zufälliges Gespräch und ein Wurstgift verändern das Gesicht Hollywoods für immer. Und ein kaputtes Thermometer setzt eine Kette von Ereignissen in Gang, die ein Land vom Kolonialismus befreien.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Durch ungeschicktes Hantieren landet eine Probe auf einem Herd, was zur Entdeckung von vulkanisiertem Gummi führt. Ein Griff nach dem falschen Widerstand beschert uns den Herzschrittmacher. Ein fehlgeschlagenes Experiment führt zu einer sicheren Methode zur Erzeugung von Flammen. Und die Suche nach neuen Galaxien könnte uns mit Außerirdischen in Kontakt bringen.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die Dämpfe eines zerbrochenen Thermometers führen zur Erfindung der Fotografie. Radarteile und ein schmelzender Schokoriegel besiegeln den Siegeszug der Mikrowelle. Und als ein potenzielles Herzmedikament in Studien getestet wird, stellt man fest, dass es auf ein anderes Organ viel stärker wirkt. Später wird es unter dem Namen Viagra bekannt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein dreckiges Labor und ein Urlaub führen zur Entdeckung unserer ersten wirksamen Waffe gegen Bakterien: Penicillin. Die Entschlossenheit eines Wissenschaftlers, die "falsche" Lösung zu testen, beschert uns einen besonders starken Kunststoff. Und aus einem nicht funktionierenden Laser wird die LED-Leuchte.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Als der Schweizer Chemiker Albert Hofmann an einem Kreislaufmedikament forscht, entdeckt er zufällig LSD. Ein deutscher Chemiker hingegen will eigentlich einen Farbstoff herstellen, doch es entsteht hochexplosives TNT. Außerdem spielt ein mit Urin gefüllter Kühlschrank eine Rolle bei der Verbesserung der psychiatrischen Versorgung.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein gescheitertes Blutdruckmedikament und unerwartet starker Haarwuchs bei einer Frau führen zu einem Mittel gegen Glatzen. Ein Versuch, das Kräuseln des Papiers in einem Zeitungsdrucker zu verhindern, beschert uns die Klimaanlage. Und auch Wilhelm Röntgen wurde bei seiner größten Erfindung vom Zufall unterstützt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein junger Medizinstudent glaubt, dass es einen Zusammenhang zwischen der Kopfform und der Intelligenz seiner Kommilitonen gibt und prägt damit die Neurowissenschaft. Als ein Chemiker im Zweiten Weltkrieg nach transparentem Kunststoff für Zielfernrohre forscht, entdeckt er nebenbei den Sekundenkleber. Und auch das Bier verdanken wir einer Reihe von Zufällen.

programme.title: LondonTown
programme.desc: England 1979. Der 14-jährige Shay Baker (Daniel Huttlestone) muss schnell erwachsen werden, denn während sein Vater mit seinem Klavierladen und einem Zweitjob als Taxifahrer versucht, irgendwie die Familie über Wasser zu halten, kümmert Shay sich um den Haushalt und seine kleine Schwester. Seine Mutter hat bereits vor Jahren die Familie im Stich gelassen, um sich in London ihren großen Traum von einer Karriere als Sängerin zu erfüllen. Als Shay die Punkerin Vivian (Nell Williams) trifft, verliebt er sich nicht nur zum ersten Mal, sondern lernt durch sie auch Punkrock kennen. Besonders die Band THE CLASH hat es ihm angetan... - - Liebevoller und mit viel Zeitkolorit ausgestatteter Familienfilm mit und über die Kraft der Musik von THE CLASH! Treffend besetzt mit Jonathan Rhys Meyers (Elvis - Aufsteig und Fall des Kings, The Tudors, Dracula, Vikings) als deren legendärer Sänger/ Gitarrist Joe Strummer.

programme.title: Babyantrag, Der
programme.desc: Layla und Derek sind Co-Moderatoren von Wake Up Chicago und müssen sich nun unerwartet um ein Baby kümmern. Ihre Chemie wächst.

programme.title: Mail Order Monster
programme.desc: Ein Film für die ganze Familie über ein junges Mädchen, das eine Freundschaft zu einem Monster-Roboter aufbaut…

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Vera (Amanda da Gloria), eine junge Frau, begleitet ältere und sehr kranke Menschen in den Freitod. Als sie bei ihrem nächsten Auftrag auf demenzkranke Gerda (Astrid Polak) trifft, stellt sie fest, dass Gerda einen geheimnisvollen Bezug zu Veras Familie hat. Vera versucht das Leben von Gerda, gegen den Willen der Familie (Ingrid Schölderle, Andreas Wimberger), zu verlängern, um das Geheimnis zu lösen...

programme.title: Ich bin William
programme.desc: Vielleicht ist es gar nicht so schlecht, dass William (Alexander Magnússon) ein Träumer ist, denn sein Leben ist wirklich nicht einfach: sein Vater ist bei einem Autounfall gestorben und seine Mutter (Stinne Henriksen) sitzt in der Irrenanstalt. Glücklicherweise kann William bei seinem Onkel Nils (Rasmus Bjerg) leben. Der hat zwar ein großes Herz, verdient sein Geld aber vor allem mit Wettspielen. Als Nils wegen seiner Spielschulden dann Ärger mit einer Gangsterbande bekommt, nimmt William sein Herz in die Hand und kümmert sich auf seine Weise um die Sache...

programme.title: Rhabarber Rhabarber
programme.desc: 10 Schritte zur glücklichen Beziehung - Wie zwei Teenager (Thor Braun, Nina Wyss) versuchen, die Hochzeit ihrer Eltern zu retten und dabei selbst viel über Freundschaft und Gefühle lernen, erzählt die charmante niederländische Familienkomödie "Rhabarber Rhabarber".

programme.title: Eine Hochzeit wie im Bilderbuch
programme.desc: Lindsey fotografiert Hochzeit von Joshs Schwester. Funken fliegen. Folgen sie dem Herzen?

programme.title: Tag X
programme.desc: Die alleinerziehende und verwitwete Tanja (Carina Diesing) wird durch die Entführung ihrer Tochter Lilly (Jolie Sarah Werner) jäh aus ihrem schwierigen Alltag gerissen, nur um einem schrecklichen Familiengeheimnis auf die Spur zu kommen... - Spannender Entführungs-Thriller um Geheimnisse, die besser im Dunkeln verblieben wären. Von den Machern der erfolgreichen Mystery Mini-Serie "Ebersberg".

programme.title: Babyantrag, Der
programme.desc: Layla und Derek sind Co-Moderatoren von Wake Up Chicago und müssen sich nun unerwartet um ein Baby kümmern. Ihre Chemie wächst.

programme.desc: Erlebe das Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen in Jordanien, wenn kreative Teams mit gewagten Designs durch die Hügel von Amman rasen.

programme.title: Premier Padel 2024 Kuwait P1 – Highlights
programme.desc: Erlebe die Action in den VAE, als die Padelprofis das Kuwait Premier Padel P1 Turnier in Angriff nahmen.

programme.title: Premier Padel 2024 Finnland P2
programme.desc: Erlebe die besten Ballwechsel, Volleys und Siegesschüsse mit den spannendsten Momenten des finnischen Premier Padel P2-Turniers 2024.

programme.title: LIVE: Premier Padel 2025 Mailand P1 Halbfinale
programme.desc: Die besten Spieler:innen der Welt treten in Italien im Halbfinale des Mailand Premier Padel P1 an.

programme.title: LIVE: Premier Padel 2025 Mailand P1 Halbfinale
programme.desc: Die besten Spieler:innen der Welt treten in Italien im Halbfinale des Mailand Premier Padel P1 an.

programme.title: Worldies S1 E11: Adventure
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Basketball-Doku: NBA-Wurfchoach Lethal Shooter
programme.desc: Die Geschichte von Chris „Lethal Shooter“ Matthews: einst Basketballprofi, heute gefragtester Wurf-Coach der Welt - Rückschläge, Neuanfänge und das unermüdlichen Streben nach Perfektion.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Helsinki 2019: Highlights
programme.desc: Das Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen fand 2019 auch in Helsinki statt - und die Dinge laufen aus dem Ruder. Die besten Momente des verrückten Rennens auf vier Rädern aus der finnischen Hauptstadt.

programme.title: Abenteuer-Doku: Die Wiege des kanadischen Kletterns
programme.desc: Zwei Extremkletterer auf Abenteuerkurs: Ihre Reise führt zum legendären Mount Yamnuska – einem der ikonischsten Felsen Kanadas und den Ursprüngen des kanadischen Klettersports.

programme.title: Space Jump: Das Vermächtnis von Felix Baumgartner
programme.desc: Noch nie gezeigte Aufnahmen werfen einen neuen Blick auf Felix Baumgartners Sprung aus der Stratosphäre. Noch Jahre später wirkt seine Mission bis heute nach – in Technik, Forschung und Raumfahrt.

programme.title: For Reals S1 E2: Felix Baumgartners Sprung aus dem All
programme.desc: Felix Baumgartners Sprung aus dem All, ein BMXer bezwingt den größten Full Loop der Welt: "For Reals" zeigt in kurzweiligen Clips, wie Athleten aus aller Welt die Grenzen des Möglichen ausreizen.

programme.title: Best of Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2018
programme.desc: Dünne Räder, ein schmaler Radstand und ein hohes Chassis sind ein Rezept für heftige Stürze bei Seifenkistenrennen - und die größten Unfälle des Jahres 2018 sind der Beweis dafür.

programme.title: LIVE: Red Bull Dance Your Style: World Final 2025 live!
programme.desc: Red Bull Dance Your Style bringt die besten Streetdancer nach LA. Wer wird vom Publikum zum Champion gekürt? Verpasse nicht das große World Final – live aus Los Angeles.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: High-school student Bella Swan, always a bit of a misfit, doesn't expect life to change much when she moves from sunny Arizona to rainy Washington state. Then she meets Edward Cullen, a handsome but mysterious teen whose eyes seem to peer directly into her soul. Edward is a vampire whose family does not drink blood, and Bella, far from being frightened, enters into a dangerous romance with her immortal soulmate.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: After the abrupt departure of Edward, her vampire love, Bella finds comfort in her deepening friendship with Jacob Black. However Bella's loyalties are put to the test as she becomes drawn into the world of werewolves, ancient enemies of vampires.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: Danger once again surrounds Bella, as a string of mysterious killings terrorizes Seattle and a malicious vampire continues her infernal quest for revenge. Amid the tumult, Bella must choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob, knowing that her decision may ignite the long-simmering feud between vampire and werewolf.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: At last, Bella and Edward are getting married. When Jacob finds out that Bella wants to spend her honeymoon as a human, he is horrified, for Edward's passion could accidentally kill her. Bella does indeed survive her honeymoon, but a new complication arises when she discovers that she's pregnant, and the child is growing at an alarming rate. The pregnancy sets the wolves against Bella and Edward, but Jacob vows to protect his friend.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: Bella awakes, as a vampire, from her life-threatening labor, and her newborn daughter, Renesmee, proves to be very special indeed. While Bella adjusts to her new state of being, Renesmee experiences accelerated growth. When the Volturi learn of the baby's existence, they declare her to be an abomination and sentence the Cullens to death. Bella, Edward and the rest of the clan seek help from allies around the world to protect their family.

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: A former government operative renowned for his stealth, Jack Cole (Steven Seagal) is now a Los Angeles police detective. When a series of horrible murders occurs in the metro area, Cole is assigned to the case, along with tough-talking fellow cop Jim Campbell (Keenen Ivory Wayans). Although the two men clash, they gradually become effective partners as they uncover a conspiracy linked to the killings, which also involves terrorism and organized crime.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: U.S. Sgt. Dunn (Keenen Ivory Wayans) is sentenced to death for a crime he didn't commit, but he gets a second chance when Lt. Col. Grant Casey (Jon Voight) handpicks him for a dangerous secret mission. Unfortunately, Dunn soon finds out that his assignment is a setup, and he is framed for the murder of the president's wife. Dunn goes on the run from the law with Dr. Constantini (Jill Hennessy), who knows the true identity of the assassin. But Casey will do anything to silence the pair.

programme.title: Exit Wounds
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars as maverick Detroit police detective Orin Boyd, whose take-no-prisoners approach to domestic terrorism gets him booted downtown to the city's toughest precinct. Multi-Platinum hip hop star DMX stars as the powerful and mysterious crime lord Latrell Walker, whose dicey connections and seemingly unlimited cash make him everyone's target. Together the two men take on a conspiracy that reaches all the way through the ranks to the heart of the precinct.

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: In a dystopian Detroit, grand houses that once housed the wealthy are now homes of the city's most-dangerous criminals. Surrounding the area is a giant wall to keep the rest of Detroit safe. For undercover cop Damien Collier (Paul Walker), every day is a battle against corruption as he struggles to bring his father's killer, Tremaine (RZA), to justice. Meanwhile, Damien and an ex-con named Lino (David Belle) work together to save the city from a plot to destroy it.

programme.title: Swordfish
programme.desc: Behind the world's most sophisticated security systems, billions of illegal government funds lie. Gabriel Shear plans to finance his own brand of ruthless patriotism if he can break into this virtual Fort Knox. He needs parolee Stanley Jobson, the only man capable of penetrating the layers of firewalls and encrypted passwords. Now Shear and his partner Ginger use every lure, including the promise to reunite Jobson with his daughter, to obtain the greatest computer hack ever.

programme.title: Family Feud Favorites

programme.title: Mann & Wife

programme.desc: Daniel and Michael go undercover in a comedy club to catch a criminal; Toni runs for the school board and goes against a mean rival.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.desc: Debra believes that Clayton has been cheating on her, and she's fed up; Destiny and Zary were about to start dating until they found out they might have the same father.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Tibbs' father-in-law creates friction; Gillespie placates a city council angry over attacks on senior citizens.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie (Carroll O'Connor) believes an assault victim (guest star Caryn West) is lying about her attacker. With Howard Rollins.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Two feuding sisters become murder suspects when it is discovered that their father died from poisoning, not heart failure.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: An ambitious councilman (O.J. Simpson) won't support black workers who crossed an all-white picket line.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Bubba (Alan Autry) is accused of the violent rape of a young black woman (Vanessa Bell Calloway). With Carroll O'Connor and Howard Rollins.

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: A woman must put her life back together after her husband of 18 years abruptly kicks her out of the house.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge, Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn and Terri, respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Monty (Idris Elba), a mechanic, struggles to make ends meet and raise his three young daughters alone. When his drug-dealing ex-wife wins custody of the girls in court, he enlists the help of Julia (Gabrielle Union), a successful attorney, to get the girls back. Romance unexpectedly blooms between the pair, but the couple must come to terms with their very different lives and find a way to keep Monty's family together.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: After a high-speed car chase, Madea (Tyler Perry) winds up behind bars because her quick temper gets the best of her. Meanwhile, Assistant District Attorney Josh Hardaway (Derek Luke) lands a case that's too personal to handle: that of a young prostitute and former drug addict named Candace (Keshia Knight Pulliam). When Candace winds up in jail, Madea takes the young woman under her protective wing.

programme.title: Eve's Bayou
programme.desc: Over the course of a long, hot Louisiana summer, a 10-year-old black girl, Eve Batiste (Jurnee Smollett), discovers that her family's affluent existence is merely a facade. The philandering of her suave doctor father, Louis (Samuel L. Jackson), creates a rift, throwing Eve's mother, Roz (Lynn Whitfield), and teenage sister, Cisely (Meagan Good), into emotional turmoil. Eve, though, manages to find some solace with her quirky psychic aunt, Mozelle (Debbi Morgan).

programme.title: Acts of Vengeance
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take -- small-time drug lords -- sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill --- for police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Samin Nosrat ("Good Things: Recipes and Rituals to Share With People You Love: A Cookbook") makes golden chicken soup; Paul Carmichael demos curry shrimp; Yara Herrera makes tres leches cake.

programme.desc: Courtney B. Vance (narrator of the audio book "W.E.B. Du Bois: Biography of a Race, 1868-1919"); 15-year-old twins whose hot-dog stand has gone viral.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: Fatale

programme.title: Rex

programme.title: Permanent Midnight

programme.title: I Am Woman
programme.desc: The story of Helen Reddy, who in 1966 landed in NYC with her three-year-old daughter, a suitcase and $230 in her pocket. Within five years she was one of the biggest superstars of her time, and an icon of the 1970s feminist movement.

programme.title: Jobs

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: Amanda occasionally baby-sits for friends and neighbors, so when the newly-arrived couple in the village ask her to sit for them, she accepts. When the baby is asleep and the parents have left, the house adopts an atmosphere of menace. The simplest domestic sound becomes an assault on the nerves: the relentless tick of the pendulum clock and the tapping, squeaking, breathing of an old house at dead of night. But soon it becomes apparent that her fears are more than just the workings of an over-active imagination...

programme.title: Horror of Frankenstein
programme.desc: On the sudden death of his father, young Victor Frankenstein inherits his title, his castle and his taste for grisly experiments. He hires a grave robber to provide him with material for his hideous work. With the aid of a violent electric storm a monster jolts into life and then escapes to the woods...Victor Frankenstein, descendant of the infamous scientist, Baron Von Frankenstein, follows in his experimental footsteps. Initially his success involves the resuscitation of a tortoise and progressing onto more ambitious projects, including creating his own monster. The gothic genre is re-worked to create a drama of black humour and farce.

programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon can't let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: When a scandal threatens to completely derail the Barden Bellas, now graduating seniors, the women must get their act together and redeem themselves at the world championships in Copenhagen, Denmark.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys'. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each other's throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friend's girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics' and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Mean Girls

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss' Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth'. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A group of scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal them. Only one man survives. He has two aims: to find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay and Jay are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top-secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

Earth's billions of inhabitants are unaware that the planet has an expiration date. With the warnings of an American scientist, world leaders begin secret preparations for the survival of select members of society. When the global cataclysm finally occurs, failed writer Jackson Curtis tries to lead his family to safety as the world starts falling apart.

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether they would be better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one another's loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Liberty's head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Effects-laden blockbuster about a huge reptile which emerges from the sea to wreak havoc in Manhattan. On a research trip to Chernobyl, a young scientist discovers a startling link between genetic mutation and radioactivity. When a fishing trawler is attacked by an unseen creature, and other evidence of a massive reptilian creature is unearthed, he realises that the creature is following a destructive path to New York.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A science professor and his cohorts battle a slew of rapidly growing alien organisms that threaten to overrun the Earth.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Effects-laden blockbuster about a huge reptile which emerges from the sea to wreak havoc in Manhattan. On a research trip to Chernobyl, a young scientist discovers a startling link between genetic mutation and radioactivity. When a fishing trawler is attacked by an unseen creature, and other evidence of a massive reptilian creature is unearthed, he realises that the creature is following a destructive path to New York.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg that's hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.desc: When Yang, his adopted daughter's beloved android, suddenly malfunctions, a father searches way to repair him. In the process, he discovers that life has been passing in front of him and he has drifted away from his family.

Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villians
programme.desc: Celebrate Halloween by facing horror at it's finest and terror in every form: from the haunted halls of `The Shining' to the unseen menace of `The Invisible Man'.

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, she's left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.
