programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Rome's Colosseum explodes, London's pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earth's engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco, only to be forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth with plans to steal Earth's resources, and when a confrontation with the invaders knocks out the Navy's radar capability, American and Japanese forces must work together to find a way to save the planet.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Rome's Colosseum explodes, London's pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earth's engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8 mm `snuff' films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic warriors must rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John thinks he's found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia: a vintage doll in a white dress. But one terrible night, devil worshippers invade their home and try to summon a demon, turning the doll into a conduit for ultimate evil.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: It's been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Laurie's ready for him.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a family's pet cat is killed, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which is believed to revive the dead. However, in doing so, they create a monster.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome' to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster `Trap'.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A séance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widow's youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss' Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth'. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Liberty's head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force that's far beyond her control.

programme.title: Psycho

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince, is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: It's the height of the Cold War, and famous archaeologist Indiana Jones (Harrison Ford), returning from his latest adventure, finds out his job at Marshall College is in jeopardy. He meets Mutt (Shia La Beouf), a young man who wants Indy to help him find the legendary Crystal Skull of Akator, and the pair set out for Peru. However, deadly agent Irina Spalko (Cate Blanchett) is searching for the powerful artifact, too, because the Soviets believe it can help them conquer the world.

programme.desc: The second of the Lucas/Spielberg Indiana Jones epics is set a year or so before the events in Raiders of the Lost Ark. programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

The artifact is much harder to find than they expected, and its powers are too much for those impure in heart.

programme.desc: After more than 30 years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete "Maverick" Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him. Training a detachment of graduates for a special assignment, Maverick must confront the ghosts of his past and his deepest fears, culminating in a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those who choose to fly it.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: On a day like no other, the wealthy Cotwell couple's baby boy scrambles unaccompanied across the bustling cityscapes of Chicago, with three slow-witted kidnappers on his tail.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A boy discovers he is `The Seeker', the last in a line of time-travelling peacekeepers who must fight against the evil Dark.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Bitten by a radioactive spider, teenager Miles Morales suddenly develops mysterious powers that transform him into Spider-Man. He must now use his newfound skills to battle the evil Kingpin, a hulking madman who can open portals to other universes.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an elite 51-year-old assassin who's ready to call it quits after completing his 72nd job. His plans get turned upside down when he becomes the target of a mysterious operative who can seemingly predict his every move. To his horror, Brogan soon learns that the man who's trying to kill him is a younger, faster, cloned version of himself.

After crashing on an unknown planet, two survivors quickly discover they're actually stranded on Earth, 65 million years ago. With only one chance at a rescue, they must make their way across an unknown terrain riddled with prehistoric creatures.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney is a 13-year-old boy who's being held captive in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: Haunting tale which centres on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from heaven. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: The comic tale of a failed sailor who sparks jealousies in a seaside community when he strikes it big in the end-of-the-pier entertainment trade. Captain Ambrose comes from a long line of seafarers, but can't be a sailor due to his seasickness, so he sets up store in a small British town, Sandcastle-on-Sea.

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: A four-inch-tall family live beneath the floorboards of a human house. The family's future is threatened when the house falls into the hands of an evil lawyer who plans to destroy it.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: Nicknamed the `Tooth Fairy' due to his penchant for knocking out other players' teeth, an arrogant hockey player's moniker becomes very apt when he steals a dollar that his girlfriend Carly's daughter has left for the real Tooth Fairy. Sprouting wings, Derek is summoned to meet the leader of the fairies, Lily, who labels him a `dream crusher' and orders him to serve as a tooth fairy to make up for his transgressions.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies: Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: Detective Scott Turner is an uptight, by-the-book police officer who hopes to leave his sleepy California town and work in the big city. When his friend Amos Reed, the proprietor of a junkyard, is killed, Turner reluctantly inherits the man's dog. Realising that the canine may be able to help him solve the murder case, Turner attempts to adjust to life with the big dog, resulting in much household destruction and unwelcome chaos.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee the Autobot finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. When 17-year-old Charlie revives him, she quickly learns that this is no ordinary yellow Volkswagen.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: Pete Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: Haunted by memories of places he's never visited, a man joins forces with a group of reborn warriors to stop a madman from destroying the endless cycle of life and reincarnation.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: Next of Kin
programme.desc: Margot, a young woman who was abandoned by her mother as a baby, travels to a secluded Amish community with a documentary film crew seeking answers about her mother and extended family.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: Historical epic spectacularly reenacting the heroic efforts of a handful of Spartan soldiers against the full might of the Persian army at Thermopylae in 480 BC.

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: On his deathbed, King Henry VIII recalls how he wooed and wed his six wives - and disposed of five of them - in a bid to secure the succession to the throne with a male heir. Despite his many marriages and the crowded Court, Henry remains essentially lonely.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: A sheriff-turned-bounty hunter captures a notorious gunfighter, hoping to flush out his murderous brother and provoke a bloody shoot-out, but he finds several others are following the same prey.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: When his mother eloped with an Italian opera singer, Louis Mazzini was cut off from her aristocratic family. After the family refuses to let her be buried in the family mausoleum, Louis avenges his mother's death by attempting to murder every family member who stands between himself and the family fortune. But when he finds himself torn between his longtime love and the widow of one of his victims, his plans go awry.

programme.title: Land
programme.desc: A local hunter brings a grieving lawyer back from the brink of death after she retreats to the harsh wilderness of the Rockies.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Two European knights of fortune have traveled to China in their search for a magical black powder that can wreak havoc. When they suddenly come under attack by some monstrous figures, they seek refuge.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: Adela and her husband, Juan, live in Texas, where he works as a ranch hand for the wealthy Tucker family. On the morning after the Purge, a masked gang of killers attacks the Tuckers, forcing both families to band together and fight back.

programme.title: Piggy
programme.desc: Sara is an overweight teen who witnesses a stranger kidnap a clique of girls who bully her on a regular basis. When police start asking questions, Sara keeps quiet as she's torn between revealing the truth or protecting the man who saved her.

programme.title: 13 rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Rough and tough OSS agent Bob Sharkey oversees a special mission to determine the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their notorious flying bombs. When a treacherous double agent murders one of the OSS recruits, Bob leaves London to personally lead the mission, centred in Paris. Based on actual OSS accounts and use of intelligence agency footage.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A soldier turned pacifist, recently returned from a bloody war, is forced into a confrontation with a bullying cattle baron. The disabled cattleman uses violence and scare tactics to push out smaller ranchers and farmers.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: A lovable Catholic priest sets out to retrieve the priceless cross stolen by a thief named Flambeau during a trip to Rome. However, Father Brown is not an ordinary churchman, and the thief meets his match.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge, a spiteful and miserly man, encounters three spirits on Christmas Eve who show him the folly of his ways.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Thirty years ago, Clifford McBride led a voyage into space, but the ship and crew was never heard from again. Now, his son must embark on a daring mission to uncover the truth about his father and a mysterious power surge that threatens the universe.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto [NEW]
programme.desc: Otto, a crotchety, irritable, and fiercely strict widower, lives a lonely life, judging everyone he sees. When he forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbours, Otto begins to change.

programme.title: Nuns on the Run
programme.desc: Small-time crooks are forced to hide out in a convent disguised as nuns, when they are pursued by gangsters and the police after parting their ruthless boss Robert Patterson from the £1 million he stole from a Triad gang in London.

programme.title: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
programme.desc: In the 1970s, Tammy Faye Bakker and her husband, Jim, rise from humble beginnings to create the world's largest religious broadcasting network. However, financial improprieties, scheming rivals and a scandal soon threaten to topple their empire.

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: Modest in scale only, this gripping rescue drama reeks of sweat-soaked claustrophobia and suspense. Peter Dawson heads a team of experts, doctors and welders racing against the clock to save a six-year-old boy who's been trapped in a seemingly impregnable bank vault.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: An Army outpost doctor clashes with his commander when he attempts to treat a band of malaria-stricken Indians.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Tony and Felix own a tramp boat and run jobs for people in the Caribbean. When they agree to transport the mysterious Irena to another island it drives a wedge between them and Tony swears vengeance against Felix for stealing her. However, Felix has other ideas.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by her suffocating schedule, touring European princess Ann takes off for a night while in Rome. When a sedative she took from her doctor kicks in, however, she falls asleep on a park bench and is found by an American reporter, Joe Bradley, who takes her back to his apartment for safety. At work the next morning, Joe finds out Ann's regal identity and bets his editor he can get exclusive interview with her, but romance soon gets in the way.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late-night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Paul Edgecomb, the head guard of death row, just wants life for him, his colleagues and the condemned to be nice and easy. However, when John Coffee, a massive man convicted of brutally killing a pair of young sisters arrives, things start to get strange. Beyond his simple, naïve nature and a deathly fear of the dark, Coffey seems to possess a prodigious, supernatural gift. Paul begins to question whether Coffey was truly guilty of murdering the two girls.

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: Idi Amin is the murderous Ugandan dictator of the late 70s and Dr Nicholas Garrigan is a young Scottish doctor. While travelling through Africa, Garrigan almost by chance becomes enlisted as Amin's doctor and confidante. However, as Amin becomes more deranged, Garrigan's close relationship with him endangers not just his own life but those around him.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Poirot is called in 14 years after the fact to re-examine the murder of renowned painter Amyas Crale - whose wife Caroline was hanged for the crime - when their grown-up daughter Lucy presents him with a letter written to her by her mother, declaring her innocence.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Society girl Elinor Carlisle, heiress to the considerable Hunterbury estate, is accused of a double murder. Poirot only has five days to investigate the case before she is hanged, and the evidence against her is overwhelming.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: While holidaying on a Nile cruise ship, Hercule Poirot is asked to investigate the death of a honeymooning heiress who has stolen her best friend's fiance. She has also crossed most of the other passengers at some time in the past.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Socialite Lady Lucy Angkatell worries about her family guests arriving for the weekend - they all loathe each other. Inviting Hercule Poirot as a distraction, the weekend is interrupted when philanderer John Christow is found dying by the swimming pool with his wife holding a gun. Poirot soon realises that he is up against one of his trickiest adversaries.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Each year, the village of Angel's Rise hosts the Psychic Fayre. Founded by the Saint-Stephens family in memory of their late daughter, the event attracts mediums, psychics and followers of the occult. When a body is found surrounded by ritual symbols on the eve of the festival, Barnaby must step into the spiritual world to find the killer.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: When the body of a missing 18-year-old girl is discovered buried on the moors, Vera delves beyond the original enquiry and into the life and the secrets of the victim.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Poirot investigates the murder of a woman on the Blue Train bound for the French Riviera and discovers that everyone on the train had a reason to kill her.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Following the story of a woman who, having lost two precious members of her adoptive family in a single year, is desperate to find her birth family.

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: The bus crews are encouraged to form their own staff football team, to take on the Basildon Bashers. Jack and Stan are not enthusiastic but there is a five pound bonus on offer.

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Detective drama series starring David Jason as the irascible and eccentric Inspector Frost. Billy Conrad has Down syndrome and something to hide, but is he capable of murder? Frost intends to keep an open mind.

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: Prisoner John Bonettie carries out a well-planned escape during a routine prison transfer, and Wycliffe and his team embark on a race against time to recapture the dangerous criminal, but events are turned upside down.

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: Anthony Ganucci's father Louie is in great trouble when he gets involved in crooked business to raise some extra money for his family, and Louie's best friend Frankie asks him to deliver a shipment of unspecified goods.

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: Wycliffe and his team move in to investigate the death of a man found blasted by a shotgun at a Cornish holiday home. The investigation reveals an animosity between the dead man and his brother-in-law, a theory backed up by tests carried out on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Tensions flare between Isobel and Cora over the management of the convalescent home, Ethel's flirtation with Major Bryant lands her in more trouble than she could ever imagine, and there is worrying news from the front about Matthew and William. Meanwhile, Branson declares his feelings for Sybil, Robert goes out of his way to bring back Bates, and O'Brien sticks her nose into Mrs Patmore and Daisy's business.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Robert receives some shocking news from the front, Daisy's relationship with William moves faster than she would like, and Bates is taken aback when Vera threatens to expose old secrets which could bring down the Crawleys. Mary is the only one who can protect the family, but she pays a high price when she turns to Carlisle for help.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: 1918: A wounded Canadian officer comes to Downton to recuperate and unsettles everything. He confides his secret to Lady Edith. Robert announces that the ceasefire will begin on the 11th November. Isobel has plans for Downton to continue to help the war wounded in some way but Cora has other ideas. Elsewhere, Thomas is still scheming.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: A new development stuns the family. Sybil and Branson try to keep their secret safe. Carlisle puts Anna in a difficult position; Bates is left reeling from the news about Vera, and Thomas embarks on a new money-making scheme.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: With the wedding approaching there is excitement in the air. Spanish flu reaches Downton and a desperate Thomas looks for a way to re-establish himself. Ethel faces a dilemma when the Bryants return with a heartbreaking proposition. A decisive Anna forces Bates to think about their future.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: When a young blonde woman is found strangled in the library of Gossington Hall, Dolly Bantry quickly calls in her old friend Miss Marple to help her with a bit of sleuthing. They soon discover that the dead woman was a dancer from the glamorous Majestic Hotel and decide to check themselves in there in order to observe the guests and solve the murder.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The village attempts to throw the Ellinghams a farewell party. Ruth helps Mrs Tishell deal with the news, but it seems that Martin and Louisa aren't going to make it to the party.

programme.title: Vera

programme.title: Coldwater
programme.desc: Fiona reconsiders her marriage to John when some unsettling truths come to light. John steels himself to face the consequences for his actions before news reaches of another death.

programme.title: Coldwater

programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians, former showgirl Rachel Phelps (Margaret Whitton), has a sweetheart deal to move the team to Miami. But to break the lease with the city of Cleveland, ticket sales have to plummet. So Phelps hires the most incompetent players available, including near-blind pitcher Rick Vaughn (Charlie Sheen) and injury-prone catcher Jake Taylor (Tom Berenger). But her villainous tactics accidentally foster a can-do team spirit, turning the Indians into potential winners.

Joe Dirt (David Spade) is a janitor with a mullet hairdo, acid-washed jeans and a dream -- to find the parents that he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was eight. As his wandering, misguided search takes him from one misadventure to another, he finds his way to Los Angeles, where a shock-jock (Dennis Miller) brings Joe on the radio to insult him. programme.title: Matching Hearts

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Mr. Builder starts repairing a water pipe. After pouring cement into the hole, he cautions that it must be guarded until the concrete has dried. However, Bruner isn't paying attention...

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Cleany is a narrow minded and quiet guy. One day, a small, injured cat is found! The Rescue Team asks Cleany to look after the cat until they find its owner but then Cleany becomes very attached...

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Today is the Regular Checkup Day. Spooky is too lazy to have a regular checkup. When Spooky comes to tow Posty to the electronic recharge station, fire comes out of Spooky's nose!

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: There's a rumour going around: there's a ghost in Brooms Town's forest!

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: School B is late and is worried about the children who are waiting for him. He looks for a short cut however, every road is blocked because of roadworks.

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Bruner feels envious that Poke gets praised for finding the old tire of the legendary car, Thunder. Bruner digs the ground in Mr. Wheeler's front yard hoping that he'll find something great.

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: On a day with a lot of lightning, one of the wheels in Mr. Wheeler's store is stolen! As Poli investigates this case, everyone begins to stop trusting each other. Does Brooms Town have a thief?

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Helly is disappointed that no one remembers his birthday. Later, Poli and his friends feel sorry that they didn't remember and so they prepare a surprise party for him!

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: Cleany overcharges himself at the electronic recharge station which is out of order. Cleany runs so uncontrollably fast. Can the Rescue Team stop Cleany?

programme.title: Satan's Cradle
programme.desc: Crooked lawyer Steve Gentry plans to take over Silver City, killing Jim Mason and framing it as an accident. He then uses a fake marriage certificate to seize Mason's property. Preacher Henry Lane tries to rally the townspeople, but is attacked. The Cisco Kid and Pancho arrive to expose Gentry's plot and restore peace to Silver City.

programme.title: Twice a Judas
programme.desc: After waking up with amnesia in the desert next to a dead man, Luke Barrett begins piecing together his past. A stranger in black reveals that Luke was hired to kill his own brother, Victor Barrett, a wealthy landowner. As Luke seeks the truth, a deadly confrontation looms, and his memory recovery brings both clarity and danger.

programme.title: Incredible Rocky Mountain Race
programme.desc: An old man observes a boy bullying his playmates and treats him to a morality lesson. The man tells the story of the epic cross-country race between a young Mark Twain and his rival, Mike Fink.

programme.title: Rattler Kid
programme.desc: Falsely convicted for robbing an army treasury, Tony Garrett escapes prison and sets out to find the real criminals responsible. As he hunts for revenge, he faces dangers and uncovers dark truths, determined to clear his name and make the true culprits pay for their actions.

programme.title: Yellow Hair and the Fortress of Gold
programme.desc: Fiery blonde half-breed Yellow Hair and her easygoing sidekick the Pecos Kid are after a fortune in Mayan gold.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother is pitted against brother in this tale of feuding ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: Buddy Goes West
programme.desc: Two outlaws, "The Doctor" and the Indian Girolamo, help a village fight a gang and a corrupt sheriff who has discovered gold beneath the town.

programme.title: Guns Of The Revolution
programme.desc: In Mexico, a mad general is leading his own war against the Church.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E13-16
programme.desc: In one of television's first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Stagecoach (1939)
programme.desc: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

programme.title: Django the Bastard
programme.desc: A ghostlike stranger arrives to avenge a Civil War betrayal. Former Confederate officers who caused the massacre of their own unit begin to die one by one, as Django delivers chilling justice from beyond the grave.

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George travels to Charlestown in Cornwall where Charlotte and Joey bought the country's most expensive public loo and plan to spend £65,000 turning it into a luxury clifftop holiday home.

programme.title: Love It or List It New Zealand [NEW]
programme.desc: Chris, Erin and their two young boys live in the West Auckland suburb of Titirangi. But residing in a rainforest comes with problems. Their 1950s home needs constant maintenance, and Chris and Erin are concerned it's too small for two growing boys.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts at The Shoes, Durham, where landlord Billy Gowland and partner Debbie Nelson hope their footwear-themed pub BandB is the right fit for their guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Biggin Hall Hotel in Derbyshire, where owner James Moffat and partner Annie Larner hope the BandBers will fall for the rural charm of their 17th-century farmhouse.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit the group head to yurt glamp-site, Forest Garden Shovelstrode in East Sussex, where hosts Charles and Lisa Hooper hope the BandBers buy into their woodland retreat.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to The Derby Manor Hotel and Restaurant run by mother and son team Fiona and James Milligan who opened their doors eight months ago after a million pound refurbishment.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's the final day of the competition and the B&B owners are meeting for the last time to find out what they've been paid and settle some scores. The Shoes is up first, followed by Biggin Hall Hotel.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the first night in the West Midlands, cheerful teaching assistant Sunita goes all out to stimulate her guests' taste buds with an authentic Punjabi feast full of big portions and bold flavours.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the West Midlands, half-Egyptian property investor Liz treats her guests to a taste of the Middle East, some startling revelations and high-energy entertainment in the hope of winning the cash prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On a fun-filled night in the West Midlands, model George asks his guests to come dressed as his favourite word - fabulous - and serves up a mixture of Greek, Caribbean and Italian food.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the West Midlands, social worker Tutsi serves up a mixture of Zimbabwean and English dishes and surprises her guests with a worm-eating competition. However, one guest is harbouring a grudge about some of her previous comments.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the last night, dark horse Digby plans an evening of fancy fine dining. However, his biggest challenge may be keeping the peace between his guests with George still upset with Sunita and with straight-talking Tutsi trying to pay Liz a compliment.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at Daisy Bank Camp in Hebden Bridge, Yorkshire. Husband-and-wife team Andrew and Angie are proud of their self-built accommodation, but upon closer inspection, some B&Bers find that not everything is fit for purpose.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&Bers head to Congleton in Cheshire for the week's second visit, at The Lion and Swan, run by best friends Katie and Jess. First impressions are good, with the guests loving the luxury on offer, but the cracks soon begin to show.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Visit three is to Emma and Emily's aptly named The Three Hills in Cambridge, where the hosts hope award-winning grub will be the key to their success. Things get off to a tricky start when one set of B&Bers have cleanliness concerns.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Darren and Jamie aim to lay on a magical experience for the B&Bers in the week's final visit, at their wizard-themed Hotel of Wizardry in Great Yarmouth. The guests are spellbound by the hotel's quirks to begin with, but the magic soon wears off.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's payment day, and there are gripes galore as the B&Bers meet one final time to dissect their feedback. After some healthy debate and plenty of arguments, the payments are revealed and we find out who's won.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: After a collision with a tree, 64-year-old Ranjan is transferred to St George's. Callum, who is 20, has mysteriously collapsed, and four-year-old Scarlett has hurt her leg in an accident.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Jahan has severe chest pains, which doctors think could be a heart attack. His daughter reveals how he fought in the Iranian Revolution and the effect that it had on his life.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics are called to a patient with hypoglycaemia, a young woman who is in agony with severe stomach cramps, a feverish toddler and a man with chest pains.

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: In Hartlepool, the heli-medics are tasked with treating a man hit by a train. Cyclist Trevor suffers serious injuries after a collision with a car, and 12-year-old motocross biker Arai in Cumbria is flown across the country for emergency surgery.

programme.title: Food Unwrapped

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Poppy and John want to enjoy their retirement in the Lot et Garonne region of France. Ben Hillman hopes he will be able to find them the perfect place for their budget of £175,000.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Chris and Allan have three grown up children between them and are hoping to buy a home in Manilva, Spain. Danni Menzies hopes to find the perfect property for them and their dog, Sirloin.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton is on the Costa Calida in Spain with Nadine, who wants to permanently relocate here with husband Tyler. Laura shows her and best friend Jannette five properties for £160,000.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Wendy and Chris from Surrey have been dreaming of owning a holiday home in Mojacar for more than 10 years. Danni Menzies hopes to impress them with the five properties she has lined up.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Scarlette Douglas is in Menorca to help Karl and Naomh, who love the relaxed lifestyle and want a place with outside space near the beautiful south east coast where they had their wedding.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: This week it is Greater Manchester, and first host is 55-year-old DJ and hairdresser Mozz from Bury. He makes garlic stilton mushrooms and poached pear, with the hope to impress his guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Manchester, and voice artist and film extra Matt hosts. He cooks up a Jewish Friday night supper, including his mum's traditional chicken soup and hopes it will be meaty enough for his guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Manchester, and budding author and mum of five Cleona is next to host. She is confident a menu based on her Jamaican roots will get her guests onside and hopes it will be enough to bag her the one thousand pounds.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Australian radio content director James is next to host in Manchester. He hopes some Chinese cuisine and his mum's cake recipe can create harmony and win the approval of his guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The final night in Manchester, and events boss Sharon hosts with her hearty decadent menu. Her skills and decorum are put to the test with Cleona and the winner the week's one thousand pounds prize is revealed.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at Sawcliffe Manor in High Risby, Lincolnshire, where hosts Emily and Jana are convinced their stylish décor and rural setting will give them the edge. But their chances of hosting a flawless visit last all of two seconds.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Charlotte and Donna host the week's second visit at Rooms at the Inn in Nottinghamshire. A visit to a recreation of a Native American camp shakes things up, and one B&Ber spends the afternoon bragging about the merits of their own establishment.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Visit three takes the B&Bers to Stanton-on-the-Wolds in Nottinghamshire, where Rob runs Wolds Wine Estate. He's certain that the idyllic location of his glamping pods in the middle of a vineyard will provide a corking experience for his guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Karlie hosts the week's final visit, at Dovestone Holiday Park in Saddleworth, Greater Manchester. Things get off to a sizzling start with the B&Bers heralding the hot tubs, but not everyone is onboard with a group meditation session.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Bust-ups about breakfast options, ding-dongs over décor, and grumblings about gravy-scented wine. It's a unique payment day, with the B&Bers meeting up for one last time to debate their differences and find out how much they've been paid.

programme.desc: Paramedics treat a man who's been stabbed in the chest and slashed across the head. A young man may have life-threatening sepsis. And a young woman who has diabetes has blood sugar readings that are so high they're off the paramedic's chart.

programme.title: Chateau DIY

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to Troy House in Painswick, where owners Alan and Denise Newman hope their guests will fall in love with their rooms.

programme.title: Car S.O.S

programme.desc: After successfully hosting a three-day wedding at their French chateau, Dick and Angel are now keen to expand their business ideas. Could the two-acre moat provide a lucrative fishing spot?

programme.desc: Lucy is recovering from a stroke suffered four years ago aged 31. She and her sisters feel a dog will help her recovery, will Fox the Chihuahua cross be the one.

programme.desc: Dick and Angel return with more family adventures and awe-inspiring renovation projects. Top of their to-do list is creating a luxurious bedroom suite in the original coach house.

programme.desc: Will doe-eyed greyhound Alinta find a new home with Sarah and Mark after a hard life as a racing dog? And can Kim find a new friend in foxie cross Cricket?

programme.title: The Dog House [NEW]
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old farmer Sam seeks a tractor cab companion, preferably one that likes to dance. Can cocker spaniel Araf hit the right note? And can Woodgreen's most relaxed resident, Fia, help to soothe a family in need?

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A look at three patients who have suffered potentially life-changing injuries, including a partially severed hand, a long-standing stab wound, and a serious quad-bike accident.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Harriet is rushed to St George's when the 13-year-old is knocked off her bike. Twelve-year-old Adam has a deep wound in his groin after falling from a tree and impaling his leg.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: The paramedics are called out to a woman who has had a seizure on a bus, a man who's too weak to reach his oxygen supply, a young woman with terminal cancer who has collapsed and a man who needs the paramedics' help just to breathe.

programme.title: Home Greek Home
programme.desc: Sarah's build is under pressure, with only five weeks to go until the Greek tourist season begins. With builders doubling up as speedboat drivers and noisy building work banned in the summer months, Sarah and her family are up against the clock.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A look at three patients who have suffered potentially life-changing injuries, including a partially severed hand, a long-standing stab wound, and a serious quad-bike accident.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Harriet is rushed to St George's when the 13-year-old is knocked off her bike. Twelve-year-old Adam has a deep wound in his groin after falling from a tree and impaling his leg.

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Some favourite Food Unwrapped investigations. In Kenya, Jimmy looks into the flavours and pricing of tea, Matt visits a Norwegian scallop farm, and Kate checks out limes in Israel.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In France, a spa owner crowns her business dream as she throws open her doors for the first time. In Portugal, there's a dip in the number of customers for the brewery owners, and in Spain, an unexpected booking causes chaos at a countryside B&B.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A Nottinghamshire couple take over a massive property in France, a high-powered business executive gives it all up to run an organic farm in the Italian mountains, and a couple from London fall in love with a rundown hotel in Spain.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Bad weather threatens a wedding at Tim and Sasha's chateau. Tim and Krys race against time to get their cookery school ready in time for visitors. And Christina and Sassan disagree over their new poolside kitchenette.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Trish makes a rotten discovery under her pool decking. Sarah and George open their doors to the entire village as they host a Bastille Day fete to celebrate their chateau's 100-year anniversary.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: This competition kicks off in Malvern, Worcestershire where retired pro-rugby player Steve Lloyd and partner Kathy Leather open their Copper Beech House to fellow B&B owners.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to the pet friendly Dog in a Doublet pub and restaurant in Peterborough where Della McGinn's passion for animals comes a close second to husband John's passion for food.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit of the week, the B&Bers head to the Torcroft Boutique B&B in Torquay, Devon, where Europhiles Phil and Sharon Hobson hope their added extras will win over their rivals.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to the 600-year-old Rhydspence Inn in Herefordshire, owned by Mark and Lowrie Price. All guests are charmed by the medieval inn, but there's still underlying tension.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's the final day of the competition and the B&B owners are meeting for the last time. Copper Beech House are first to host, and Steve and Kathy want Phil to swallow his synthetic sausage comments.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz come to the rescue of their first-ever custom car, a radically modified VW Beetle called a VW Wizard.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are off to Southampton to take on a 1969 Jensen Interceptor. Owner Nick cherished his dream car until he got extreme arthritis.

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.desc: Dick and Angel crack on with replacing the whole of the chateau's original roof. Angel has a colourful vision for Dick's preserves cupboard, but first they must painstakingly revive all 50 metres of the original handcrafted oak shelves.

programme.title: The Dog House Australia

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro – in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way – they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go “back to school” to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much “fish out of water” at the academy, even with the “cool kids” – Robin and Ava – showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and t

programme.title: The CHI Jackers
programme.desc: The Wolves have become strong because of the stolen CHI. And now they are stealing even more. Soon all the other tribes of CHIMA have none. Laval and Eris must find a new, clever and “Wolf proof ” way to get CHI to the tribes.

programme.title: Symptoms!
programme.desc: Owen falls prey to the toxin of a poisonous prehistoric jungle flower and believes he's a raptor.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Ninja follow a clue to Arin's location but find a new threat, while Nya, Kai and Wyldfyre spark old grudges in their search for Jay.

programme.title: The Ultimate Object of Admiration
programme.desc: Arin nurses Ras back to health as they continue his training, meanwhile their trail leads the Ninja into more danger.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: Spit Take!
programme.desc: A Dilophosaurus runs loose in the park's hotel, and Owen and Claire must find it before the guests notice - and before Vic's dino-hunting security team can damage the hotel and the guests.

programme.desc: Finally, the Avengers confront Ultron and his Ultron Minions as they attack Avengers' Tower. programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: After making a speech in Moscow vowing to never negotiate with terrorists, President James Marshall boards Air Force One with his family and advisers. When a group of terrorists led by Ivan Korshunov hijacks the flight, the President's principles are put to the test. Feigning escape, ex-solider Marshall stows away in the aircraft and must race against time to rescue his family and everyone else on board.

programme.title: Creed
programme.desc: Adonis Johnson (Michael B. Jordan) never knew his famous father, boxing champion Apollo Creed, who died before Adonis was born. However, boxing is in his blood, so he seeks out Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) and asks the retired champ to be his trainer. Rocky sees much of Apollo in Adonis, and agrees to mentor him, even as he battles an opponent deadlier than any in the ring. With Rocky's help, Adonis soon gets a title shot, but whether he has the true heart of a fighter remains to be seen.

programme.title: Creed II
programme.desc: In 1985, Russian boxer Ivan Drago killed former U.S. champion Apollo Creed in a tragic match that stunned the world. Against the wishes of trainer Rocky Balboa, Apollo's son Adonis Johnson accepts a challenge from Drago's son -- another dangerous fighter. Under guidance from Rocky, Adonis trains for the showdown of his life -- a date with destiny that soon becomes his obsession. Now, Johnson and Balboa must confront their shared legacy as the past catches up to both men.

programme.title: Creed III
programme.desc: Still dominating the boxing world, Adonis Creed is thriving in his career and family life. The face-off between former friends is more than just a fight. To settle the score, Adonis must put his future on the line to battle Damian -- a fighter who has nothing to lose.

programme.desc: College football pregame show with Urban Meyer, Mark Ingram, Matt Leinart, Brady Quinn and Dave Portnoy. Led by Rob Stone, the group analyzes the biggest games, with special attention to the "Big Noon Saturday" game on FOX.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Bearcats (4-1, 2-0 Big 12) roll into this matchup with the Knights (3-2, 0-2). Cincinnati finished just outside the AP Top 25 after upsetting then-No. 14 Iowa State 38-30 on Oct. 4. Evan Pryor rushed for 111 yards and two scores in the win.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Nittany Lions (3-2, 0-2 Big Ten) welcome the Wildcats (3-2, 1-1) to Happy Valley. Penn State fell out of the AP Top 25 after two straight losses, the last a shocking 42-37 defeat to UCLA at the Rose Bowl. Northwestern beat UCLA 17-14 in Week 5.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Hawkeyes (3-2, 1-1 Big Ten) and Badgers (2-3, 0-2) renew a rivalry that began in 1894. Iowa has won three straight meetings after a 42-10 decision in 2024. Hawkeyes senior quarterback Mark Gronowski has rushed for seven touchdowns this season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Lobos (3-2, 0-1 MWC) rumble onto the blue turf for a match with the Broncos (3-2, 1-0). Boise State has won seven straight contests against New Mexico, a run dating back to 2016. The Broncos come off a 28-7 road loss against the Fighting Irish.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 1 Buckeyes go up against the No. 17 Fighting Illini. Ohio State is off to a 14th consecutive 2-0 start in Big Ten play, and a fourth straight 5-0 start overall after trouncing Minnesota 42-3 on Oct. 4. OSU boasts the nation's top defense.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Wildcats host the Horned Frogs. Kansas State beat TCU 31-28 in overtime in the 2022 Big 12 title game, and won 41-3 during the last meeting in 2023. TCU quarterback Josh Hoover is among the nation's leaders with 15 touchdown passes in 2025.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 9 Red Raiders (5-0, 2-0 Big 12) test their unbeaten record against the Jayhawks (4-2, 2-1). Texas Tech cracked the top 10 in the AP poll for the first time since 2013, when it started 7-0. Texas Tech is 11-1 versus Kansas in Lubbock, Texas.

programme.title: NHRA Drag Racing
programme.desc: From Texas Motorplex in Ennis, Texas.

programme.desc: 1st Round, Group G.

programme.title: UEFA Nations League Soccer
programme.desc: Spain and Portugal face each other from Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany. Both teams seek to win the tournament for a second time with Portugal winning in 2019 and Spain winning in 2023.

programme.desc: Trusted brand Jacuzzi Bath Remodel and interior designer Christina Hall share their secrets on how you can easily and affordably transform your bathroom into a gorgeous custom, safe, stylish space in 1 day! Call for a FREE quote & installation.

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Forced out of his own company by former protégé Darren Cross, Dr. Hank Pym (Michael Douglas) recruits the talents of Scott Lang (Paul Rudd), a master thief just released from prison. Lang becomes Ant-Man, trained by Pym and armed with a suit that allows him to shrink in size, possess superhuman strength and control an army of ants. The miniature hero must use his new skills to prevent Cross, also known as Yellowjacket, from perfecting the same technology and using it as a weapon for evil.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: Constable Ichabod Crane is sent to the village of Sleepy Hollow, where a headless horseman is leaving a trail of decapitated bodies.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A scientist (Vincent Price) builds an animated human being -- the gentle Edward (Johnny Depp). The scientist dies before he can finish assembling Edward, though, leaving the young man with a freakish appearance accentuated by the scissor blades he has instead of hands. Loving suburban saleswoman Peg (Dianne Wiest) discovers Edward and takes him home, where he falls for Peg's teen daughter (Winona Ryder). However, despite his kindness and artistic talent, Edward's hands make him an outcast.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: After Barbara and Adam Maitland die in a car accident, they find themselves stuck haunting their country residence, unable to leave the house. When the unbearable Deetzes and teen daughter Lydia (Winona Ryder) buy the home, the Maitlands attempt to scare them away without success. Their efforts attract Beetlejuice, a rambunctious spirit whose help quickly becomes dangerous for the Maitlands and innocent Lydia.

programme.title: Cruella
programme.desc: Estella is a young and clever grifter who's determined to make a name for herself in the fashion world. She soon meets a pair of thieves who appreciate her appetite for mischief, and together they build a life for themselves on the streets of London. However, when Estella befriends fashion legend Baroness von Hellman, she embraces her wicked side to become the raucous and revenge-bent Cruella.

programme.title: Hocus Pocus
programme.desc: After moving to Salem, Mass., teenager Max Dennison (Omri Katz) explores an abandoned house with his sister Dani (Thora Birch) and their new friend, Allison (Vinessa Shaw). After dismissing a story Allison tells as superstitious, Max accidentally frees a coven of evil witches (Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy) who used to live in the house. Now, with the help of a magical cat, the kids must steal the witches' book of spells to stop them from becoming immortal.

programme.title: Hocus Pocus 2
programme.desc: The Sanderson sisters bewitch Salem for a second time.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: After Barbara and Adam Maitland die in a car accident, they find themselves stuck haunting their country residence, unable to leave the house. When the unbearable Deetzes and teen daughter Lydia (Winona Ryder) buy the home, the Maitlands attempt to scare them away without success. Their efforts attract Beetlejuice, a rambunctious spirit whose help quickly becomes dangerous for the Maitlands and innocent Lydia.

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: An unemployed actor disguises himself as an elderly nanny in order to spend more time with his estranged family.

programme.title: According to Jim
programme.desc: Jim has big plans for Ruby when she is hired for a cookies advertisement.

programme.title: Total Gym 50 Years of Moving You
programme.desc: For years, Total Gym has been a leader in fitness, empowering millions to achieve their health goals. One piece of equipment does it all. Over 100 unique exercises. No assembly required. Folds for storing. Go to TotalGymDirect.com for special offers!

programme.title: According to Jim
programme.desc: Cheryl goes behind Jim's back and lends money to Andy for a down payment on a new condominium.

programme.title: According to Jim
programme.desc: Cheryl gives Jim a revealing photo of herself as a Valentine gift, and he proudly shows it off to his friends.

programme.title: Star Wars: A New Hope
programme.desc: The Imperial Forces -- under orders from cruel Darth Vader (David Prowse) -- hold Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher) hostage, in their efforts to quell the rebellion against the Galactic Empire. Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill) and Han Solo (Harrison Ford), captain of the Millennium Falcon, work together with the companionable droid duo R2-D2 (Kenny Baker) and C-3PO (Anthony Daniels) to rescue the beautiful princess, help the Rebel Alliance, and restore freedom and justice to the Galaxy.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: The adventure continues in this "Star Wars" sequel. Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill), Han Solo (Harrison Ford), Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher) and Chewbacca (Peter Mayhew) face attack by the Imperial forces and its AT-AT walkers on the ice planet Hoth. While Han and Leia escape in the Millennium Falcon, Luke travels to Dagobah in search of Yoda. Only with the Jedi master's help will Luke survive when the dark side of the Force beckons him into the ultimate duel with Darth Vader (David Prowse).

programme.title: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill) battles horrible Jabba the Hut and cruel Darth Vader to save his comrades in the Rebel Alliance and triumph over the Galactic Empire. Han Solo (Harrison Ford) and Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher) reaffirm their love and team with Chewbacca, Lando Calrissian (Billy Dee Williams), the Ewoks and the androids C-3PO and R2-D2 to aid in the disruption of the Dark Side and the defeat of the evil emperor.

programme.title: Jungle Cruise
programme.desc: Dr. Lily Houghton enlists the aid of wisecracking skipper Frank Wolff to take her down the Amazon in his ramshackle boat. Together, they search for an ancient tree that holds the power to heal -- a discovery that will change the future of medicine.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, they'll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves - or they'll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: When Spencer goes back into the fantastical world of Jumanji, pals Martha, Fridge and Bethany re-enter the game to bring him home. But the game is now broken -- and fighting back. Everything the friends know about Jumanji is about to change, as they soon discover there's more obstacles and more danger to overcome.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: Growing up in the early 1800s, P.T. Barnum displays a natural talent for publicity and promotion, selling lottery tickets by age 12. After trying his hands at various jobs, P.T. turns to show business to indulge his limitless imagination, rising from nothing to create the Barnum & Bailey circus. Featuring catchy musical numbers, exotic performers and daring acrobatic feats, Barnum's mesmerizing spectacle soon takes the world by storm to become the greatest show on Earth.
